title: Sydney Care
description:
Worried about Coronavirus?
The outbreak of COVID-19 Coronavirus continues to be a health challenge both in the US and globally. Screen yourself and assess your risk for free with a COVID-19 Assessment available now through Sydney Care.
 
‚Ä¢	Assess your risk for free based on CDC guidance
‚Ä¢	Get personalized guidance about what to do next
‚Ä¢	Connect with doctors via text chat or video
‚Ä¢	Read curated information from authoritative sources


Sydney Care offers personalized symptom checking, real-time treatment from real doctors, prescriptions and labs ordered, all from your device

recentChanges: Minor feature updates.
comments: Initially, I had issues with the app crashing. I read the reviews and saw the developer's feedback that this known issue has been resolved in latest version. So I downloaded the latest version and everything works smoothly. The app has a Coronavirus assessment which is very timely and useful. Pretty cool. You can even chat with a doc. I'll start with this app next time I'm thinking about going to see a doctor.

The world really needs this right now. They have a covid assessment based on Cdc.im impressed. Yeah it was buggy at first but I noticed the developers are updating this app quite often, probably attempting to fix bugs and making healthcare available to people at home. Yeah the wait times could be long but it's better than waiting at the hospital with a ton of other people not practicing social distancing. I got to chat with a doctor and it's good to have doctor advice at this time. Keep it up

The app freezes my phone. It's worse than nothing! Update on 3/21/2020. At your suggestion I uninstalled and reinstalled. Same thing. I have a Samsung Galaxy S9+. It still freezes my phone immediately when I click the icon. Blue screen. Nothing else. I never get to the point where I can answer questions.

As others have said I've never had an app make me so F------ mad! I've also tried every way you can imagine and can't get in. There is never a code sent. I if so where is it? This app sucks! I'll be glad to remove it.
Impossible to use, this app crashes right when you get to the section that asks you questions. I've tried two different devices with the same result on each.

title: Google Classroom
description:
Classroom is a free service for schools, non-profits, and anyone with a personal Google account. Classroom makes it easy for learners and instructors to connect‚Äîinside and outside of schools. Classroom saves time and paper, and makes it easy to create classes, distribute assignments, communicate, and stay organized. 

There are many benefits to using Classroom:
‚Ä¢ Easy to set up ‚Äì Teachers can add students directly or share a code with their class to join. It takes just minutes to set up.
‚Ä¢ Saves time ‚Äì The simple, paperless assignment workflow allows teachers to create, review and mark assignments quickly, all in one place.
‚Ä¢ Improves organization ‚Äì Students can see all of their assignments on an assignments page, and all class materials (e.g., documents, photos, and videos) are automatically filed into folders in Google Drive.
‚Ä¢ Enhances communication ‚Äì Classroom allows teachers to send announcements and start class discussions instantly. Students can share resources with each other or provide answers to questions on the stream.
‚Ä¢ Affordable and secure ‚Äì Like the rest of G Suite for Education services, Classroom contains no ads, never uses your content or student data for advertising purposes, and is free.


Permissions Notice:
Camera: Needed to allow the user to take photos or videos and post them to Classroom.
Storage: Needed to allow the user to attach photos, videos, and local files to Classroom. It's also needed to enable offline support.
Accounts: Needed to allow the user to choose which account to use in Classroom.

recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: After the latest update, pressing on a classroom causes an error 'something went wrong, try again later' then I'm automatically unrolled from my class! I'm furious about this issue and it seems that many other people are getting it. It needs attention. Other than that, before the update Google classroom is great and I used it all the time to recieve assignments and post asignments

Hey err... When I try log into my school account, it says "We are sorry, but you do not have access to Classroom" and "Please contact your domain administrator for access" and then it kicks me out of my school account! Weirdly though, it works through my Gmail account... I don't understand why it's saying that so please fix it! I need to work on things for school! üò≠ (P. S: I'm using an Android phone)

I use this app as a student. IMHO, complexity of the app is low - the task for junior developer. But even here some things aren't good. At first, menu item "calendar" just opens system default calendar. Silly. Secondly, there is no possibility to configure notifications. Earlier push notifications appeared the day before due date, but last week they started to show at midnight of the due date and woke me up. Big Brother decided this is convenient for all. Keep up good work. One star so far.

As some people have pointed out, with one of the latest updates I can no longer access any classes or log in. The app seems to be in a Beta update... I never signed up for it... Google also hasn't fixed it yet which makes me think it isn't a serious issue for Google. Just revert the update, please!

Before the February 20 2020 update it was working just fine but after installing the lastest update, it keeps removing me from my classes. I think this is an app problem because on the website version of google classroom my classes are still there. I uninstalled the app and downloaded it but now it is saying that my gmail doesn't work. I just to let you guys know that can you please update the bug, thanks.

title: BetterMen: Home Workouts & Diet
description:
BetterMen: 30 Day Fitness Planner To Boost Muscles is designed to catch up with your personal training needs. Whether you're looking to lose some weight or bulk up some pounds. It is the ultimate workout app for men that will help you reach your goals at home or at the gym. With its easy at-home workouts and gym programs you can work out wherever you want. 

You can easily lose weight at home or gain muscles at the gym, get six pack abs, get stronger arms and core with a personal trainer in your pocket. 

Video guided workouts, custom meal plans for weight loss or muscle gain all in one fitness app. 

BetterMen app offers a digital personal trainer experience and takes your workouts up a notch. If getting leaner, fitter and stronger is on your menu then this is the app you were looking for to fulfil all your fitness needs.

By downloading our workout app for men you get exactly what you bargained for: weight loss full body workouts, 30 day weight loss challenges, fat burning, 6-pack abs and chest exercises, legs and butt workout programs oriented at toning you up,  and not to mention our top-notch warm-up and stretching routines which will undeniably make you forget what pulling a muscle or spraining an ankle means. Reach your maximum physical potential and unrivalled results with the BetterMen app.

Our detailed video and animation guides will walk you through every step and explain each exercise in the easiest way possible for maximum result.

BetterMen app makes tailoring workout programs to your goals, tracking your progress and weight trends, customising your general fitness preferences a breeze.

Key features:
1. Exercises with video support ;
2. Text instruction and animation for each exercise;
3. Ability to save and track you progress;
4. Personalized recommendations based on your fitness targets;
5. Unlimited access to hundreds of weight loss or muscle building workouts.

BetterMen app includes multiple exercises which range from body-part specific to total-body routines: jumping jacks, burpees, mountain climbers, crunches, jump squats, shadow boxing, plank, donkey kicks, wall sit, tricep dips etc.

Bodybuilding and strength training is most effective when done properly. Bettermen app provides you with top exercises that will help you get 6-pack abs, jaw-dropping biceps and sculpted body in general. Get jacked and build muscle with our on-demand workout app for men.

Why should I consider downloading this app?
- It includes workout programs for weak chest, skinny arms, thin legs, beer belly, how to build muscles and weight loss workouts.
- Fast, easy and effective muscle building workouts.  
- Custom muscle gain meal plans.
- Fitness app design for man.
- Good for beginners as well as advanced athletes. 
- You can track your progress.
- Workout with personal trainer everywhere.

Burn fat effortlessly with the best workout app. We recommend trying our 30 day weight loss challenge for men or 30 day muscle building challenge that will ensure your speedy weight loss and efficient fat shredding.

developerAddress: FLORINIS 7, GREG TOWER, 2ND FLOOR, 1065, NICOSIA, CYPRUS
recentChanges: Stability improvements.
comments: Don't fall for the "free trial"! There is no free trial. After you click on the free trial link and create your profile, they put you in their Premium subscription and charge you $60. I should have done a better job of reading the reviews before downloading this app. False advertising!! This app should be banned by Google.

Can't verify email (it sends me an email, but the link just takes me back into the app). No way into the app without signing up for a "plan" with card details first. I've had to enter target area, height, weight, target weight, dietary requirements five times now and then get to the same point. Circular waste of time.

It's a good app, it doesn't really set itself apart for the subscription price. Bodybuilding.coms app is more expensive , but they also give an exhaustive amount of information and content from specific workouts to meal prep how to and grocery list. If it had just a grocery list added to this app would raise the bar really high.

Tried to use the 7 day free trial today on 3/1/2020 just to see what the app was like before i bought a subscription. I was istantly charged for a year. Everything on the app just basic info. I canceled the subscription the same day i want my money back.

I can't even put all of my information in without the app freezing. I have exited and restarted, as well as uninstalled and reinstalled. Neither has worked. I'd like to see how the plan works, but unable to.

Get secret deals and exclusive mobile coupons with the official BURGER KING¬Æ app and save like a king! Explore our menu and find your nearest BK¬Æ restaurant anytime, anywhere. And in most locations, you can even order ahead.
Specific features include:

- Mobile Ordering: For select locations, order with the app and skip the line to enjoy your meal even faster.

recentChanges: Updates and bug fixes!
comments: Don't bother with this useless app.The app hasn't worked right since february of this year, 2020. It constantly loops to sign in, sign up. You can sign up and it loops again. I've reported it via support more than once, nothing changes. Bugs are never fixed. The managers say "we can't do anything about it. Our customers are very upset, but we have no way to report the problem." Other fast food apps seem to work. What's wrong with Burger King?

When I first started using this it was great. You can pay through it and not have to deal with cash. Very discounted Impossible Burgers and other deals so you don't have to carry BK coupons around. Now almost every time I open it it says Downloading Update and the update often fails. Last time I placed an order it got glitchy and said try later, so I retried and ended up getting double billed. Please simplify the app that used to work fine. Galaxy Tab A 2019 Android 9.

Overall, the apps is great. The deals are worthwhile and change enough to keep coming back. My only complaints are that sauce and drink choices are incomplete as well as when ordering a deal that contains two sandwiches, the modifications to the second sandwich are not given to the staff making our food. This has happened to me every time and I have verified the modifications in my order history.

Can't log in on the app. There is no option to put in username and password. It sends an email with a link to click to log in. That works great for the web app but if you click the link to open the app. Nothing. Who tries to run a script on a web page to open an app on your phone? Poor design. Just order on the web.

I like the deals but the functionality is lacking. The previous app, for its failings, was at least consistent. Now I get the notice that my connection has issues, so it won't load the cart. Been this way over a week. I also miss the "I'm here" function that would make sure you weren't charged until you could pick up your food, and your food would be fresh. My Burger King is horribly slow, so it's nice to give them some lead time

title: BetterMe: Home Workouts & Diet
description:
BetterMe: 30 Day Fitness Challenge To Lose Weight is designed to catch up with every woman personal training needs. Whether you're looking to lose some weight at home, get a personal diet plan, tack water intake or get personal trainer advice, we‚Äôve got you covered. Our 30 day weight loss challenges for all body parts will help you tone up your body and lose weight in specific areas if your body. With our easy at-home workouts and you can:
- get perkier butt
- get slimmer arms
- lose leg fat 
- get rid of hip dips
- get flat tummy
- lose weight and tone up your muscles 
Video and audio guided workouts, custom meal plans for weight loss, water tracker and personal trainer feature all in one app. 
BetterMe app offers a real personal trainer experience and takes your workouts up a notch. If getting leaner, fitter and stronger is on your menu then this is the app you were looking for to fulfill all your fitness needs.

This app is perfect for burning belly fat, burning leg fat. It's also beginner friendly and considered as the best weight loss app on the market.
You can easily track your weight loss progress with our convenient app, you can also track your steps, as our app has built in step tracker, water tracker and calorie tracker, all these features or your fast and healthy weight loss journey.
So why should I consider downloading this app?
- It includes weight loss workout programs for all body parts (fat loss workout, arm workout, leg workout, butt workout, tummy fat burning exercise).
- You get custom weight loss meal plans.
- It‚Äôs designed for women and covers all modern woman needs.

- No equipment, no gym, bodyweight workouts.
- Customize your own workout routine .
- Focus on your trouble zone with simple & effective fat burning workouts from BetterMe. 
Burn fat effortlessly with the BetterMe app. We recommend trying our 30 day weight loss tummy fat burning challenge that will ensure your fast & healthy weight loss journey.

comments: This is BS!! DON'T BELIEVE the 1 week FREE TRIAL! It's a LIE! It'll ask for your CC for "in case you don't cancel in time" but when you do cancel in PLENTY of time it will tell you 'NO REFUNDS' that is FALSE ADVERTISING and just plain BS in my book!! I'm FURIOUS! I was raised to believe there's nothing worse than a thief and a liar and they are BOTH!

Signed up for th 7 day free trial. Cancelled the same day (so as to not forget). Charged for a full year 7 days later. Not impressed af all that the 7 day trial with the option to cancel was not true. Feeling very misled by the app. ***I have responded to your email with the required information and still have yet to receive a refund***

I didn't mean to subscribe to this app. I only wanted to try the 7 day free trial and it charged me for the year. I also went to add something to food log and everytime I scanned the barcode it couldn't find it. It also doesnt have normal stuff, for example lunchables or mountain dew. Crazy!!!!

I wanted to do a trial week of this app. When I signed up it only gave me the option for a yearly subscription. So I thought well, it says there is a trial week I can cancel later right,.....wrong. The trial option only applies to the monthly subscription, which I didn't get the option to choose between yearly or monthly. So now I am stuck with an app for the next year that I may not even use. Be careful before you hit subscribe. Better Me did.make things right and I did get my refund.

Do NOT get this app!!! I was thought there was going to be a 7 day trial but then it charged my card for the full year. I tried to cancel realizing that it was a horrible app, but I couldn't. I emailed them and got an automated reply and it said they would get back with me within 48 hours and they did not.. This app is very misleading. I got my refund from this app. I still would not get this app

title: ClassDojo
description:
Ready to build an amazing classroom community?

ClassDojo is a beautiful, safe, and simple communication app for teachers, parents, and students. 

* Teachers can encourage students for any skill, like ‚ÄúWorking hard‚Äù and ‚ÄúTeamwork‚Äù
* Teachers can bring parents into the classroom experience by sharing photos, videos, and announcements
* Students can add their classwork easily to their own digital portfolios for their parents to see
* Teachers can also safely and instantly message with any parent
* Parents see their child‚Äôs updates at home, as well as a stream of photos and videos from school
* All your favorite teacher tools, like Group Maker and Noise Meter, are now in one place!

ClassDojo helps teachers build a positive classroom culture by encouraging students and communicating with parents.

ClassDojo is free for everyone, and K-12 teachers, parents, students, and school leaders in over 180 countries have joined. It works on all devices, like tablets, phones, computers, and smartboards.

See how much people love ClassDojo at: www.classdojo.com/wall-of-love/

Join the ClassDojo community today!

recentChanges:
"Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes... including you." Anne Lamott

We fixed a few bugs and improved the performance of the app in this update! More things still to come :)
comments: It's all right, but everytime I go to use it I have to log in. Which is annoying cause since we're on lockdown/isolation we're using it even more for the kids school work. And also when you login as a student, there is access to the other student's profiles- which is annoying because my kids keep clicking on their classmates accounts.

App was working fine and then it kept telling me "Oops something went wrong". After reading multiple reviews, I uninstalled, power cycled my devices and reinstalled the app. For what? Nothing but the same "oops". This isn't an Oops, especially AFTER an update meant to address these issues! I have NO way to communicate with my child's teacher especially now that he's out for 2 weeks!

I have used this app for a few school years & enjoyed it but about 2 months ago it gave me an error message & stopped sending/recieving texts. I've uninstalled/reinstalled it but now I get an error message to try again to log in later. I've tried it on a different device. I've tried to request a password reset but that failed also. Is there anything else I can try?

Horrible! Why fix what wasn't broken? I have used Dojo for years. I have told everyone about it. Now that you have updated it, nothing works right. Yes, I uninstalled and reinstalled. I have signed out and in. Nothing is right. If I wanted my app to spin a blue circle for hours then this would get 5 stars. I need it to work regularly as my students depend on it and this new version is erratic at best.

This app is an amazing tool to keeping in contact with your kids teachers. I was having a problem with my app, deleted it, reinstalled it, and even updated it (waited for an update) and still had problems. So I emailed Class Dojo and they helped me to get it working properly again! Thanks to Rachael with customer support!!!

title: Seesaw Class
description:
Seesaw is a student-driven digital portfolio that inspires your students to do their best work and saves you time. 
‚àô Any device, shared or one-to-one 
‚àô Always free for teachers
‚àô Used in over 200,000 classrooms and 1 out of 2 schools in the US

Awards Include: 
‚àô 2018 Top Pick for Learning by Common Sense Education
‚àô Best Website of 2016 by American Association of School Librarians
‚àô Richard Byrne's Free Tech for Teachers

How Does Seesaw Help Teachers? 
Seesaw‚Äôs creative tools encourage student engagement
‚àô Students express themselves, reflect on their learning and create a portfolio they're proud to show others. 

Get ideas and save prep time
‚àô Browse thousands of great activities ready to use in your classroom today. 
‚àô Collect student responses digitally and lug home fewer papers.

Focus even more on your students

title: Google Text-to-Speech
description:
Google Text-to-speech powers applications to read the text on your screen aloud. For example, it can be used by:
    
‚Ä¢ Google Play Books to ‚ÄúRead Aloud‚Äù your favorite book
    
‚Ä¢ Google Translate to speak translations aloud so you can hear the pronunciation of a word
    
‚Ä¢ TalkBack and accessibility applications for spoken feedback across your device
    
‚Ä¢ ... and many other applications in Play Store
    


    To use Google Text-to-speech on your Android device, go to Settings > Language & Input > Text-to-speech output. Select Google Text-to-speech Engine as your preferred engine.
    Note, on many Android devices, Google Text-to-speech is already turned on, but you can update to the latest version here.
    


    Supported languages: Bangla (Bangladesh), Bangla (India), Cantonese (Hong Kong), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (Australia), English (India), English (United Kingdom), English (United States), Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French (Canadian), French (France), German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Khmer, Korean, Mandarin (China), Mandarin (Taiwan), Nepali, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Sinhala, Slovak, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (United States), Sundanese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.

comments: I like it so for,some of these apps are kind of misleading ,,some people are just afraid of trying something new,,not me I like,,,CHANGE, sometimes it is a good thing,,ok,??
Now Google add mandatory "breath" sound, which is extremely annoying and cannot be disabled.

This app is a must for me! Because I am severely hard of hearing, I have difficult time pronouncing many words, let alone complete a sentence. Sure, I could simply communicate with hearing person by writing or texting back and forth BUT it not always possible. It is because some people can't or barely can read, some have bad eyesight, and/or their native language isn't English. This is where Google Text-to-Speech comes to the rescue. I am thankful I live in this day and age! üôèüòÉüî•

Look, this is a really useful tool. I drive a lot and, for me, it reads my text messages. It's a safety tool. But recently I can't get some of the settings to stay set. The voice I choose reverts to one I didn't want to use. And my choice for 'update only over wifi', 'reduce music volume', and 'somewhat expressive intonation' also revert to the default settings. No response to feedback. I thought maybe it was my device or the app I was using, but I see others here have tried the same problem A sad end to such a great service.

title: Istation
description:
Istation‚Äôs Android app provides subscribing educators and registered students with access to engaging digital instruction and educational resources, including Istation Reading, Istation Espa√±ol, Istation Math, Writing Rules! with Calvin Cool, and Teacher Station. Free with every Istation subscription, the Android app extends lessons to Android devices, allowing students to engage with hundreds of interactive, research-based activities.

The app records students‚Äô usage , and the results are included on the Istation Report and Management Web site; this allows educators to view student progress and support intervention across platforms.

This app makes learning on the go fun and convenient by opening the door for more discovery and practice. Students continue studying with all of Istation‚Äôs colorful characters, songs, and animation. The app makes learning exciting and motivates students to succeed. 

For non-subscribing educators interested in learning more about Istation‚Äôs all-in-one educational technology, visit www.istation.com. 

If you have any issues, please e-mail our support team at support@istation.com or call us at 1-866-883-7323, option 2. Contacting us directly will ensure we provide a quick, easy-to-understand answer for your specific need.

title: Gmail
description:
Gmail is an easy to use email app that saves you time and keeps your messages safe. Get your messages instantly via push notifications, read and respond online & offline, and find any message quickly.
With the Gmail app you get:
‚Ä¢ An organized inbox - Social and promotional messages are sorted into categories so you can read messages from friends and family first.
‚Ä¢ Less spam - Gmail blocks spam before it hits your inbox to keep your account safe and clutter free.
‚Ä¢ 15GB of free storage - You won‚Äôt need to delete messages to save space.
‚Ä¢ Multiple account support - Use both Gmail and non-Gmail addresses (Outlook.com, Yahoo Mail, or any other IMAP/POP email) right from the app.

I used to be able to send over 10 pictures at a time and in sequence, now its max 6 and all over the place.... any chance we could have the resize element back??

I love Gmail. But it never deletes my spam when I tell it to. My emails come thru late. I have to pull the screen down to make it sync. Even though I keep my account clear of old emails and constantly delete anything that I'm done reading. I'm still having problems. So I have to uninstall all updates and reinstall the app weekly. Just so it works properly for a few days.

gmail now crashes no matter what fix I apply. Also...I've lost the ability to make this the default, or to default to another email app so I can open my hyperlinks. Every time I click a link it crashes and I never changed my settings. This update is the worst one ever. I'm switching everything off of Chrome, because I live and work by my email. I cannot function! And yet...ALLL of my emails are GMAIL! I want a divorce. After 3 weeks of complaints, you would think someone would get the message.

Something weird has been going on with my gmail Android app for some days. It does not open. Absolutely nothing happens when I click on the App button except a totally blank white screen with only the + sign for new email on the bottom right. I have no idea what to do. Please help me, Gmail is essential for my work. Update: Fixed it by uninstalling and reinstalling all updates. Leaving this review here for the record.

title: Domino's Pizza USA
description:
Conveniently order Domino‚Äôs from anywhere on your Android phone or tablet. Build your pizza just the way you like it or choose one of our specialty pizzas. Add items from the rest of our oven-baked menu including chicken, pasta, sandwiches, bread, drinks and desserts. And with the Domino‚Äôs Tracker ¬Æ you can follow your order from the moment you place it until it‚Äôs out for delivery or ready for pickup!

Use the Domino‚Äôs app to order from locations in the United States, not including Puerto Rico. To place an order in Puerto Rico, visit www.DominosPR.com.

¬°Pide Domino‚Äôs en ingl√©s o en espa√±ol! Nuestro app se configura autom√°ticamente con el idioma que has escogido para tu smartphone o tableta.

Utilice la aplicaci√≥n de Domino a la orden de localidades en los Estados Unidos, sin incluir Puerto Rico. Para realizar un pedido en Puerto Rico, visite www.DominosPR.com.

FEATURES:

¬∑ Create a Pizza Profile to easily access to your saved info and recent orders (not required)

¬∑ Order faster than ever by creating an Easy Order! 

¬∑ Sign up for Domino‚Äôs Piece of the Pie Rewards¬Æ and earn points toward free pizza!

¬∑ Pay with cash, credit card, debit card or Domino‚Äôs gift card

¬∑ Use our voice ordering assistant, Dom, to add items to your cart and to select a coupon

¬∑ Use Android Wear to track orders, or place an Easy Order or Recent Order right from your wrist

¬∑ Use Domino‚Äôs Tracker notifications to follow your order until it‚Äôs out for delivery or ready for pickup!


APP PERMISSIONS:

Location
¬∑ Precise location/GPS ‚Äì identifies your closest stores for easier carryout ordering

Phone
¬∑ Directly call phone numbers ‚Äì makes it possible for you to call your local store with a single tap within the app

Camera
¬∑ Take pictures and videos ‚Äì used to quickly capture debit or credit card information at checkout

Photos/Media/Files
¬∑ USB Storage ‚Äì required for upgraded Google Maps

Microphone
¬∑ Record audio ‚Äì needed to enable Dom, our voice ordering assistant

Bluetooth connection information
¬∑ Needed for integration with Ford Sync, Android Wear and Pebble watch

Device ID & call information
¬∑ Read phone status and identity ‚Äì required as part of the Ford Sync feature, this is used if you want to call your store through Sync while your phone screen is locked

Other
¬∑ Full network access ‚Äì this allows us to communicate with the Domino‚Äôs systems to provide you with the latest store menus and coupons and it is needed to place orders from the app

¬∑ View network connections - required by Google Maps, which we use to show store locations

¬∑ Network communication - enables push notifications, giving you access to app exclusives, coupons and deals

¬∑ Control vibration ‚Äì helps alert you to updates, like changes in order status as it progresses through the Tracker

¬∑ Prevent phone from sleeping ‚Äì if you are using your voice to order, the app will prevent the phone from going to sleep (which would otherwise happen because you aren‚Äôt tapping the phone)

comments: I lined up the photo with the edges of the card and it changed screens to re-enter information. Once I gave all my credit card information that it asked by auto-fill, it asked for re-entry again. I hate chancing my credit card information. Why offer a scan or auto fill that doesn't work? My experience with this app has been great every time. In fact I look forward to ordering pizza because of this app. No more being put on hold or some one not understanding my order or what I'm tryn to have done. This app makes me feel like I'm right there giving instructions to the chef because everything come out perfect and it still amazes me each time. Thank you Domino's.

This app works super well. I am highly pleased. I'm able to make orders, customize them with ease, and have them deliverer/carried out with no problem. Highly recommend doing it this way, in comparison to calling the numbers. It's easier on us who order and much faster to process for those who are making the pizza as well. It's a win/win.

The prices also help when you have 2 growing teenagers and a husband to feed, they eat alot so finding a place we all love at prices we can afford for the amount of food we order is amazing!! Plus never have we gotten a bad meal or bad service at this location!! Its always a win win for us!! Thank you!!

Difficult. Trying to pay was horribly difficult if auto-filling the card information. It acted like it accepted the info, but would drop everything after reloading the checkout screen. recentChanges:
We're constantly working on improving Norton Secure VPN and appreciate all of your feedback.

In this release, we've been focused on making improvements to the connectivity issues that have been occurring.

Any suggestions? Let us know what you think by leaving a review.
comments: Connection to VPN disconnects every few minutes requiring user to relaunch the app to re-establish the connection. Very annoying when you want to continue browsing knowing the VPN will remain connected. To the best of my knowledge I have instructed my phone not to restrict the app and allow it to auto start. I have also enabled 'connect automatically' within the app itself. App also doesn't launch immediately, instead you have to look at s picture of a lighthouse?

I will revise this review after I have had time to use it more and evaluate all aspects of it, but I strongly recommend using Norton antivirus and Norton Secure VPN, as well as most Norton products in general because it's been a solid, tried and true company for at least 40 years, (or as long as I've been alive.)

Great for security I had the same issue others had on the trial broke down an paid for the subscription and it works totally opposite of the trial The security for transactions is completely different very secure I do not have every thing I look up follow me advertisers are not able to follow me. If you bank or use a trading platform or purchases you will see the difference. I was very skeptical. Glad I made the purchase and was able to buy a lifetime purchase norton AV for 5 devices with VPN.

Update: 3/14/2020 - now no longer works at all, not able to "set up Norton account" can't even get into the program. Have tried uninstalling and reinstalling several times. Norton Mobile Security seems to work just fine...but this VPN app flat out doesn't work. I answer to developer comment, same problem either over my home wifi or cellular. Doesn't matter. Takes a LONG time to connect. Many times it NEVER connects. When it works, it seems to work well though...just very hit and miss.

What a ridiculous and useless app. Unstable, and wouldn't connect. I assumed it was because I was using a limited version during the free trial. So then I went to cancel, which was insanely difficult and wound up being charged for something I can't use. Tryi g to request a refund from my phone on the mobile website put me into an endless loop of new tabs being opened, without ever being able to request my refund. This comes off like a scam, which is a shame considering the Norton reputation.

title: First Aid - American Red Cross
description:
One of ‚Äú8 New Apps You Don't Want To Miss‚Äù (6/16/2012) ‚Äì Mashable
‚ÄúFirst Aid By American Red Cross is a fix for what ails you.‚Äù - Appolicious
‚ÄúOne of the 50 Best Apps for Parents of 2012‚Äù ‚Äì Babble.com
 One of ‚Äú10 apps that can save your life during a natural disaster‚Äù - ComplexTech

 Accidents happen. The official American Red Cross First Aid app puts expert advice for everyday emergencies in your hand. Get the app and be prepared for what life brings. With videos, interactive quizzes and simple step-by-step advice it‚Äôs never been easier to know first aid. 

 Ahora disponible en espa√±ol. 

Features: ‚Ä¢ Easy to use Spanish language toggle to switch translation directly inside the app. 
‚Ä¢ Simple step-by-step instructions guide you through everyday first aid scenarios. 
‚Ä¢ Fully integrated with 9-1-1 so you can call EMS from the app at any time. 
‚Ä¢ Videos and animations make learning first aid fun and easy. 
‚Ä¢ Safety tips for everything, from severe winter weather to hurricanes, earthquakes and tornadoes help you prepare for emergencies.
‚Ä¢ Preloaded content means you have instant access to all safety information at anytime, even without reception or an Internet connection. ‚Ä¢ Interactive quizzes allow you to earn badges that you can share with your friends and show off your lifesaving knowledge. 

The app is ad-free and spam free.

Privacy policy: http://www.redcross.org/privacy-policy 
EULA: http://www.redcross.org/m/mobile-apps/eula

Copyright ¬© 2012-2019 The American National Red Cross

comments: It's a good app, but the choking quiz is giving a problem. One question is asking me to find where to press between the shoulder blades, but it's not giving me the right answer. I need some help to fix this, because i really need this and to get my CPR card.
Overall good, but one of the questions on the broken bone quiz is literally impossible to get correct! The question is even worded different in the review.
This app is a good helpful reminder for those who take first aid course, but don't necessarily use the skills often.
This App is great, I'm very happy to have it I'm a babysitter and a coach so when things like bee Stings happen or anything else I feel ready!
Great tool to keep reviewing my first aid and CPR training!

title: Device Care
descriptionHTML:
For a more pleasant experience while using your Galaxy smartphone, try the "Device Care" app by Samsung Electronics. With the "Device Care" app, anyone can easily keep their smartphone in good condition. The intuitive screen layout and interactions help the user check the condition of their device at a single glance and maintain their smartphone easily without expert knowledge, as it enables them to take prompt actions if problems, such as malware (viruses, spyware), arise.

Some Galaxy devices may not support some of the features outlined below.
App updates via the Google Play store are only available on some devices.

[Main features]
- Reports the current condition of a customer's smartphone on a 100-point scale;
- Optimizes a smartphone in one simple click;
- Analyzes battery usage on a per-app basis and saves battery power by checking unused apps via App power monitor;
- Identifies battery-draining apps;
- Provides Power saving mode and Maximum power saving mode to ensure that the user can enjoy their smartphone for an extended period of time;
- Offers a feature to remove unnecessary files automatically;
- Manages and frees up RAM efficiently;
- Detects malware (viruses, spyware) and provides real-time protection for smartphones; and
summary: Device Care - optimize your Galaxy smartphone
developerAddress: 129, Samsung-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do, 16677, Rep. of KOREA
recentChanges:
[ Android 10 ]
- Android 10 is now supported.
- The look of the Battery usage page has been improved.
- Some bugs have been fixed.

[ Android 9 ]
- Some bugs have been fixed.
comments: I updated Feb 8 2020 and now (feb 10) my fone constantly needs charged. I have never had a problem with this app. I actually always use it and like it. This has been the only change to my fone. I have checked different settings to make sure something isnt using battery without me knowing. I just charged the fone and had 20% battery use in a very short time. Something is not right.

The application is useless without the "clean now" option. Had to uninstall the update. Update: came back to check if they added replacements to the missing features, but they haven't. On top of that, it appears that they use paid reviewers to bump up their rating of the app, shameful and absolutely deceitful, especially for a company of this size that doesn't depend on the app for its livelihood.

Dear Samsung, problem solved. I deleted the update, and got my clean and clear button back. I will not be updating that app for the duration of time I still have this phone. Furthermore, if this is to be Samsung's policy, going forward, to make things better by making them worse, this will be the last Samsung product I ever buy again!

theres a problem with this update,the storage clean now button is missing and the storage doesnt get cleaned. It worked before the update. I uninstalled this update to fix that problem. Being how this isn't an app you can delete,when are you going to fix the storage cleaning option. Perhaps you should partner with ccleaner,they have the best cleaner on the market.

This application was perfect before Android 10 update. Not only can you NOT Clean Now the device yourself, the widget that shows ram usage and storage is no more accurate as I am using my device. There was a comment early that said if it is not broke do not fix it. It applies to this situation. Seems to be a little bit more thorough. Not 100 percent. But it is good enough

title: Android Accessibility Suite
description:
Android Accessibility Suite is a collection of accessibility apps that help you use your Android device eyes-free or with a switch device.

Android Accessibility Suite includes:
‚Ä¢ Accessibility Menu: Use this large on-screen menu to lock your phone, control volume and brightness, take screenshots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Select to Speak: Select something on your screen or point your camera at an image to hear text spoken.
‚Ä¢ Switch Access: Interact with your Android device using one or more switches or a keyboard instead of the touch screen.
‚Ä¢ TalkBack screen reader: Get spoken, audible, and vibration feedback as you use your device.

NEW IN ANDROID ACCESSIBILITY SUITE 8.1

Important: This update to Android Accessibility Suite requires Android 6 or later. Learn how to check your Android version: https://support.google.com/android/answer/7680439

Version 8.1 updates:
‚Ä¢ Improved TalkBack usage hints for local context menu.
‚Ä¢ Improved Select to Speak design for devices with narrow screens.
‚Ä¢ Improved Select to Speak support for Dark theme on devices running Android 10.
‚Ä¢ Removed TalkBack settings for "Explore by touch," "Automatically scroll lists," "Shake to start continuous reading," "Enhanced focus," "Dim screen," and "Tap on side of device" gestures.
‚Ä¢ Other fixes and improvements.

Learn more about using Android Accessibility Suite and other Android accessibility options: http://g.co/help/androidaccessibility.

To get started:
1. Open your device's Settings app.
2. Select Accessibility.
3. Select Accessibility Menu, Select to Speak, Switch Access, or TalkBack.

Permissions Notice
‚Ä¢ Phone: Android Accessibility Suite observes the phone state so it can adapt announcements to your call status.
‚Ä¢ Accessibility Service: Because this app is an accessibility service, it can observe your actions, retrieve window content, and observe text that you type.

comments: I would love to give you guys a 5-star rating for Android accessibility. I think it is an excellent application for the blind, and the best screen reading application out there for smartphones. However though, I cannot give you a 5-star rating, because your application is not being very successful with my Pandora Media application. It's not being accessible to me, because it is not reading to me where to add songs to certain playlist. Can you guys come up with a better update to fix this?e?

As a tester an developer of android apps This app is the absolute foundation for many of the best qualities expidited in the Android. What works without this app works better with it. This is a must have for the Android thats opening a new an exciting new generation of inteligent applications changing there place in the world today . I'm in Awe of what must be next. Everyone watch for big changes sooner than you think. A0Sincerely ("3rd Ghost")

Hello I am blind and using TalkBack sometimes but not often. I noticed that reading is getting delay srart compared to eloquence (third party apo). I am using eloquence since long for three languages (English, Hindi and Gujarati) and then Google also introduce these laguages but still I can't use Google for regular use because it is starting late reading.

First of all. You should remove the hint that is action available. Because it's so boring for regular uses visually impaired person. Secondly I would like to tell you you must add automatically scroll list. Because we are facing many problems. This was removed in last update. And you must improve the app because it does not read unlabled buttons. Thank you for helping the blind people

The UI is really ugly! Here are some suggestions, kindly work on them. -Remove the arrows from the bottom and add some dots that indicates there are other pages. -The background is excessively bright for a accessibility menu, make it transparent or blur it. That would look amazing and professional. - Make the buttons moveable similar to the notification bar

title: CDC
description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET
Get the official CDC Mobile application for your tablet and/or smartphone and access the most up to date health information.

FILTERING OPTIONS
Organize your home page so that the information that‚Äôs most important to you appears first! Turn off the content you don‚Äôt want with just a flip of a switch and reset it all with the tap of a button.

CONTENT
The app ensures that you‚Äôre getting the most up to date health information. The home screen lets you see all your information in one place and updates whenever your device is connected to WI-FI. Enjoy a greater variety of content such as stories, videos, podcasts, and features to give you the most current health information from CDC. 

Browse Featured Articles, stay on top of health news in the Newsroom section, and view CDC Images of the Week. If you‚Äôre a journal reader, view the latest Morbidity & Mortality Weekly Report, Emerging and Infectious Disease journal, or the latest on Preventing Chronic Diseases. You can even search CDC‚Äôs web content from the app.  

We'd love to hear your thoughts about the app! Rate the CDC Mobile App in the App Store or leave a comment to let us know how we're doing. You can even send us an email through the app if you have suggestions for improvements!

comments: I was hoping you'd have the numbers of cases on the Covid 19 virus to keep me updated & whomever else decides to add this app?.I'm glad someone has created it though making it easier to check on outbreaks..I'm aware that it's an old virus mutation & newly somehow released or spread that's probably why the techs haven't had the chance to update info..Join the club I can't seem to get much done myself..Life is like a roller coaster..üëçüëá

It's a very confusing app. You see a topic and you cick on it and it takes you to page that does not continue the article and you can't find where the continuation of the article is. Considering how important this app should be it really sucks in getting the info you need...

Worthless. The "lead" article is over a week old. Seriously? Why even have an app for the public if you're not going to provide current infotmation? No COVID-19 numbers or statistics. It's not even on the disease list. Ridiculous.
I just downloaded this app and it not only covers the coronavirus pandemic, but issues concerning the public. Very informative.
Last update Covid-19 date back to 4 days and it's not even an update. This app is poor and cannot be relied upon.

title: Messenger ‚Äì Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere. 
 
FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like facetime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.  
 
UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS 
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they‚Äôre across the world.  Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop. 
 
RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.
 
TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE 
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface. 
 
EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS 
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.
 
SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS 
There‚Äôs no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.
 
SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money from friends in the app by adding your debit card or PayPal account.
 
SHARE YOUR LOCATION
Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.
 
CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.
 
BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger. 

COMPATABLE ACROSS PLATFORMS 
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and iOS.
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ 
LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (http://messenger.com/)   

* Data rates apply

comments: Since a couple of weeks the direct share link on a Samsung Galaxy S10 does not work any more. It does not get you the option to choose which people to send to. It the application was opened, it basically takes you too it, but if not, absolutely nothing happens. Direct share works with other apps, though!

What's wrong whith this app?! Messages can't be sent on my screen, while others see my messages and it doesn't showing me that. My messages are sent but not delivered or seen. And my chat list isn't loading. It happens to me every day and resetting end reinstalling isn't working. Fix this Facebook. It's annoying. üôÑ It started 3-4 weeks ago.

Text works great. But when I call people it seems like the voice and video calls don't always work here in Cleburne TX. When I call people on the other side of the world it works fine but here in my town the calls don't always go through or get dropped or bad quality. Maybe the internet availability needs improvement in my town.

Messenger recent update is bugged and I have tested it already on all 3 devices of mine, both android and iOS. Whenever I am trying to share something through messenger (be it a YouTube video, a photo, or an audio clip I have recorded in my phone's internal app), it will only pull up the Messenger app as if I am not sharing anything!!

messenger sucks anymore.....have not been able to share and send articles to my friends as I did before, by clicking on share, then messenger and then name used to come up and I would click send next to their name, but will not and has not done for three going on four days today and do not know why! Is there something wrong with messenger? Can you please fix this problem and asap, thanks!

title: WWE
description:
Take WWE with you wherever you go with the official WWE App.
 
In addition to showcasing the latest WWE videos, news and photos, the WWE App is your portal to WWE Network, where you can stream:

‚Ä¢ Every live WWE pay-per-view ‚Äì including WrestleMania 
‚Ä¢ Thousands of hours of video-on-demand
‚Ä¢ Groundbreaking original series, reality shows and documentaries
‚Ä¢ Premier in-ring shows like NXT and 205 Live
‚Ä¢ Replays of all of your favorite episodes of Raw and SmackDown 
‚Ä¢ Every WWE, WCW and ECW pay-per-view in history.

The WWE App also gives you instant access to all your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends. View Superstar profiles for a quick look at extensive career milestones, biographies and more!
 
Download the WWE App today to unlock all things WWE!

Download the WWE App today to unlock all things WWE!
summary: Take WWE with you wherever you go ‚Äì any time, day or night.
recentChanges: - Improvements to reduce being unexpectedly signed out
comments: I'm having so much fun with this app! I'm rewatching every wrestling PPV, show, and specials from the 70's forward. I'm about to hit Summer Slam '92! This app is amazing, but I would suggest two things. 1. The buffering issues can be annoying at times. 2. I wish that you have an option to select by year, and it would give you the list of all shows, PPVs, and specials in order(wcw, wwf, ecw included). Right now I am going off a list from Reddit, but it's not always accurate.

If I'm going to watch something like elimination chamber that happened yesterday when I pause / unpause it, it goes right back to the very beginning and restarts everything all over again instead of stopping and picking up where it left off if you can please fix that that would be awesome because I was not having problem with it before it would have been before the new year actually. If you could please fix these bugs, thanks a lot.

Cons: The closed captions are inaccurate on scripted shows. They also censor words that aren't censored in the audio and words that have ass in their spelling. Even if you have orientation locked on your device, the screen rotates. Playback controls require double taps. Pros: Loads of content. Whatever your favorite era of wrestling, you can watch it. The price is well worth it. If the technical issues are fixed, I'd happily rate this 5 stars. I just wish the weekly shows were available sooner.

The problem I'm having is it wont play the most recent ppv. It did this for super showdown as well. It kept saying "something went wrong, no access granted" I checked the status of my account and still says subscribed. It loads up every other show as well. Why cant I watch the elimination chamber? I just tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app and I get the same message

My only complaint is you cant watch weekly episodes until about 30 days after they air, which makes it almost useless because by that time you've already had what happened spoiled and you just feel like you're behind on everything. However it is a great deal since you can watch PPV events live without having to spend any extra cash, and you get a bunch of cool weekly talk shows/documentaries/etc. to watch. Definitely will keep you entertained.

title: BetterMe: Walking for Weight Loss
descriptionHTML:
Introducing our new BetterMe Walking app! Walk to burn calories and lose weight! Choose your top goals, set the difficulty and start walking daily to burn fat, reduce stress and get rid of negative thoughts. Weight loss has never been this easy with this walking App!!!

TRAINING PROGRAMS:

- Daily walking audio guided programs for different goals
- Walk to reduce stress and sleep better
- Individual programs of interval training designed specifically for weight loss;
- ready-to-use 3-month training plan that includes 5-7 workout days a week;
- 3 program options for various levels: ideal both for those who just starting their healthy lifestyle journey or for those who are full on living healthy and working out regularly;
- suitable for out- and indoor workouts.

EASY WORKOUT MODE:

- Audio instructions to each training;
- Detailed statistics;
- Easy access to music, audiobooks and podcasts right from the app;
- Enter your parameters and our app will automatically customize your daily step goal;

STAY MOTIVATED:

- daily reminders to make sure your walk off your daily step goal
- weight loss has never been this easy with walking programs

All BetterMe: Walking users can try the app for free by signing up to a free trial period. During the free 3-day trial, you‚Äôll get the star treatment and will be able to try all App Features!
BetterMe: Walking app users can choose the subscription plan that suits their needs best - our Premium subscription plan offers unlimited access to every level of every imaginable workout routine in exchange for a single payment. For your convenience, BetterMe: Walking subscriptions are set to automatically renew within the 24-hour period prior to the subscription end date. You can cancel your subscription at any moment, too.

Constructive criticism is always welcome. Our fitness, weight loss and diet specialists, as well as our developers, are working constantly to improve the user experience and cater to a wider range of our customers‚Äô needs.
Contact our client support via support@betterme.tips.
summary: Professional interval walking fitness plan to burn fat and lose weight.
developerAddress: FLORINIS 7, GREG TOWER, 2ND FLOOR, 1065, NICOSIA, CYPRUS
recentChanges: Small improvements to deliver you even a better experience
comments: Awful, honestly, you might as well use the free step counter on your phone because that's basically all it does. I just bought it today, but due to policy I can't be refunded for an app I'll never use. The features are beyond basic.

I would not recommend this app. I'm not finding any detailed stats within the app and only one of the graphics in the promo seems to have actually been taken from the app. Overall, this app is not even close to the advertised description.
Great app as I like accountability. Just wish I could link it with my fitbit.
Said it was a free subscription, and said AFTER that 5hey would charge but nooooo they charged me when i signed up for the free subscription
I enjoy this app because I need that extra push and stucture. It's not easy for me I have health issues, but I can do this!! Love it!

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.
NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.
  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don‚Äôt want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.
  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.
  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.
  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.
  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.
  Keep in mind:
  ‚Ä¢ Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  ‚Ä¢ Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).

recentChanges:
This release:
‚Ä¢ Stability and performance improvements
comments: I have been using google voice for a few years now without ANY problems but all of a sudden it stopped working. I cant make/receive calls nor send/receive text messages. I have uninstalled three times in an effort to fix the problem but it's still not working. This is causing a huge disruption for me and there seems to be no technical support.

Usually great, but since the latest update, the notification on my lock screen (and thus also when I unlock) keeps disappearing. It'll show up for a few minutes, but if I don't get to it fast enough or if I don't see it right away, it just goes away. I keep needing to go into the app to make sure I haven't missed texts.

I really appreciate being able to have a second number that I can keep permanently for keeping my personal phone personal. I don't want everyone calling my cellphone; close friends, family etc yes! Business contacts, retail memberships, creditors, not at all. Nothing sucks more when trying to relax than some a-hole blowing up your phone. Got to love Google for this service! @ pthis price this service cannot be beat. Thanks Google Team!! Sincerely, Moe

Cant give it a 5... works great so far, definitely notifies me when I missed a call and it went to voicemail, but I want to either extend the number of "rings" before it goes to voicemail, OR disable the voicemail feature and review my missed calls! Either option would be good, and allow me the time to get to the phone to answer it! I am not so young that it is attached to my hand, and it seems to go to voicemail very quickly. Please advise on either option that I would like to utilize!

I've been using Google voice for a while now. I really enjoy having one phone number for everything. I'm not sure if I'm imagining this but it seems like I don't get very many spam calls to my number which is super nice. The search leaves something to be desired and the chrome plugin no longer works.

title: Remind: School Communication
description:
Remind is a communication platform that helps every student succeed. Whether you're in the classroom, at home, or anywhere in between, Remind makes it easy to stay connected to your school community.

* Communicate in real time‚Äîon any device.
* Keep personal contact information private.
* Translate messages into more than 90 languages.
* Share files, photos, and content from your favorite sites.

Join the millions of educators, students, and parents using Remind to manage school communication and make time for what's important. Visit our site to learn more: http://www.remind.com
descriptionHTML:
Remind is a communication platform that helps every student succeed. Whether you're in the classroom, at home, or anywhere in between, Remind makes it easy to stay connected to your school community.

* Communicate in real time‚Äîon any device.
* Keep personal contact information private.
* Translate messages into more than 90 languages.
* Share files, photos, and content from your favorite sites.

Join the millions of educators, students, and parents using Remind to manage school communication and make time for what's important. Visit our site to learn more: http://www.remind.com
summary: School Communication
recentChanges: To make your Remind experience great, we update our app every two weeks with features that help simplify communication and improve speed and performance. You can turn on automatic updates in the Play Store app, and check out our FAQs for what‚Äôs in our newest release: rmd.me/updates
comments: This app could be a lot better. If you are in multiple different groups/classes, it doesn't allow you to push text notifications on which ones you want. You either get notifications via text for every single group you're in or none at all. Super annoying as I don't want nor need texts to be pushed through for every group I'm in! When you email tech about this or anything else, they're super unhelpful and won't actually address anything you asked about . Truly wish I didn't have to use this app!

I use Remind for spur-of-the-moment communications with my university students. It works perfect in these kind of situations. My only complaint is that part of Remind could be geared toward college and university students. For example, the icons are clearly geared towards primary and secondary education. Unless I haven't figured out how, which could be the case, I would love it if things like the icons could be personalized or have more options that could be for college-level students.

My experience with this version and the apple version were completely different. When i am typing the last few messages is hiding behind the keyboard. Not only that the app doesn't really send me reliable message notifications, yku can expand but if it's longer than the first line it won't show, it also doesn't show if they're read. Messages don't appear when the notification does. It's a very frustrating experience and I would like it if it were fixed.

Its an incredibly helpful app, however it is incredibly frustrating how slow it is to send messages to teachers. Even with my own personal data, with good connection, it takes really long. I hope they fix this, or the whole purpose of communicating with teachers fast is not happening.

Very great for school, but one key problem: If I were a teacher, I would want to delete old groups or messages that aren't wanted. Unfortunately, there is no way to delete messages or groups. It is great, near perfect for school communication, but I just wish there could be a way to remove conversations. Other than that, its a really great app!

summary: Grocery to Recipe - make recipes with ingredients you already have at home.
recentChanges: Fixed bug that caused clearing of pantry when adding invalid ingredients.
comments: This app is awesome! Even if I don't choose a specific recipe, it's great for generating ideas. Especially when it comes to not wasting food (and, therefore, money). Pick a key ingredient (what am I going to do with all this zucchini??) and a course (not another loaf of bread!) and it pops out dozens of recommendations. My only complaint is the favorites tab is not MY favorites. It's generated the same as the home page.

Its easy to use. And convenient when you cannot think of something to make. The only thing i do not like is trying to add an item that the pantry does not have, for instance garbanzo beans or canned chicken. Its frustrating because I would to search for a recipe to use up my beans that is not hummus or a salad. Happy Cooking!

The user should be able to add ingredients not already stored in the database since the app is using an algorithm to mine the internet for recipes it should be able to find added ingredients too. Your database doesn't have deli meats, dairy creamer, fruit pie fillings, and many other ingredients that a lot of recipes on the internet call for.

It's great... in theory. But if there's a feature I'd say is missing, is being able to make a separated list for what you USUALLY have available, and what you CURRENTLY don't have/don't want to use. I might want to filter a large number of things out of the search I'm doing for my next meal, but then I'll have to manually find & add that bulk of things back into the list one by one even if they're things I would usually have no problem procuring. A "temporary" list would be nice for that.

This app didn't have some of the basic ingredients I have on hand so I substituted semi similar ingredients. It gave me basically different ways to cook salmon, rice or to make butter but no meals utilizing any of my ingredients together, which is what I download the app for. Pretty useless for my needs. I'm deleting it momentarily. Bon appetit!

title: Google Family Link for parents
description:
Try the free Family Link parental controls app from Google. Whether your children are younger or in their teens, the Family Link app lets you set digital ground rules remotely from your own device to help guide them as they learn, play, and explore online. For children under 13 (or the applicable age of consent in your country), Family Link also lets you create a Google Account for your child that's like your account, with access to most Google services.


  With Family Link parental controls, you can:

 Guide them to good content

 ‚Ä¢ View their app activity - Not all screen time is the same. Help your child make healthy decisions about what they do on their Android device, with activity reports showing how much time they‚Äôre spending on their favorite apps. You can see daily, weekly, or monthly reports.
 ‚Ä¢ Manage their apps - Handy notifications let you approve or block apps your child wants to download from the Google Play Store. You can also manage in-app purchases, and hide specific apps on their device, all remotely from your own device.
 ‚Ä¢ Feed their curiosity - It can be hard to figure out what apps are right for your child, so Family Link shows you teacher-recommended apps on Android that you can add directly to their device.


  Keep an eye on screen time

  ‚Ä¢ Set limits - It‚Äôs up to you to decide the right amount of screen time for your child. Family Link lets you set time limits and a bedtime for their supervised devices, so you can help them find a good balance.
  ‚Ä¢ Lock their device - Whether it‚Äôs time to go play outside, have dinner, or just spend time together, you can remotely lock a supervised device whenever it‚Äôs time to take a break.


  See where they are

  ‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs helpful to be able to find your child when they‚Äôre on the go. You can use Family Link to help locate them as long as they‚Äôre carrying their Android devices.


  Important Information

  ‚Ä¢ Family Link‚Äôs tools vary depending on your child‚Äôs device. See a list of compatible devices at families.google.com/familylink/setup
  ‚Ä¢ While Family Link helps you manage your child's purchases and downloads from Google Play, they will not need approval to install app updates (including updates that expand permissions), apps you have previously approved, or apps that have been shared in Family Library. Parents should regularly review their child‚Äôs installed apps and app permissions in Family Link.
 ‚Ä¢ You should carefully review the apps on your child‚Äôs supervised device and disable those you don‚Äôt want them to use. Note that you may not be able to disable some pre-installed apps.
 ‚Ä¢ To see the location of your child or teen‚Äôs device, it must be powered on, recently active, and connected to the internet.
 ‚Ä¢ Teacher-recommended apps are only available on Android devices in the US to parents of children of certain ages.
 ‚Ä¢ While Family Link provides tools to manage your child‚Äôs online experience, it does not make the internet safe. Rather, it is intended to give parents choices about how their kids use the internet, and encourage conversations about internet use.

summary: Set screen time limits, manage apps, and view app activity for your kids device.
recentChanges:
Set time limits for individual apps - Not all screen time is created equal, so Family Link enables parents to set time limits for each individual app or game their kids have on their device.
Bonus screen time for the day - Parents love that they can set a daily screen time limit, but sometimes kids need just a few more minutes. Now, parents can grant more screen time directly from their own device.
comments: Love this app, I am managing 3 acc for my children, I can set the time limit in which they can be in their android devices. And when they are grounded I can lock it tio prevent them from using their devices. I'm having a small issue though, tried to add Dad(my husband) into the family group but we're being prompted that he isn't in the same country. I even changed it to make sure they are both set up in the same country, and still won't let me add him.

This is a great resource for parents and caretakers who have children with smartphones. I am able to monitor both screentime and content from my phone. My child(ren) can ask permission to download an app from their phone. If approved I can see information about time of use and stop or limit an individual app. The only thing I had trouble with was the family location. However after disabling the wi-fi( including the phone searching for wi-fi)the location service was more consistent and accurate.

Tried to connect a child's account to the parent account. Got an error about 'different countries' - checked the child's account, no country has been set up - and the only way to set up a country is to add payment method (credit card) from that country. No, sorry, isn't going to happen. Users should be able to set their play store country without any payment method whatsoever, and/or in the case of setting family accounts allow different members of the same family to have different "countries". This is a very poor design decision. Not user friendly and quite annoying.

Love this app.. you can lock devices and apps. Set time limits for apps. The only thing I DONT like is that you cant remove it from device you have to completely delete the Google account. You can however use the suspend feature and go right back to it.. but I would like to remove it without having to delete my kids account. So please fix that issue and I'll give you 5 stars...also wish it followed fir EVERY platform across the board.

This is one of the worst apps I have ever used unfortunatly I have to give the app one star. It claims to give you control over the apps/websites,the ability to set schedule of when the devices can be used, to be able to lock devices and block apps. NONE of this is actually true. If you set a schedule for the devices to be shut down, the times will change or not lock at all. If you block an app or lock a device, it will unblock or unlock by itself in minutes. Complete waste of time.

title: healow
description:
healow‚Ñ¢ lets you communicate with your doctor‚Äôs office and access up to date medical records. You will be able to access your appointments, lab results, vitals, manage medications and other personal data all within one app. From the healow‚Ñ¢ app you can manage multiple accounts and access your and your family‚Äôs medical information. 

Find a doctor and book your appointment - fast, free & easy, at your convenience ‚Äì morning, noon or late at night! No more waiting on the phone with your doctor's office for an appointment. Find an appointment that works for you and book instantly ‚Äì on the go!

Set your goals and track them easily using trackers. Use our weight management & activity trackers to reach your fitness goals. Track your numbers regularly to watch the trends change and share your progress with your doctor. Stay motivated to make healthy choices.

summary: Manage your and your family's health information.
recentChanges: - Bug fixes and feature enhancements
comments: Awful. Dont even enable fingerprint! Before you even begin it starts glitching over and over. Then logs you in and boots you out, I repeated that step 5 times before I could finally see my appointment. Went to add subscribers and then was given an alert saying that they couldnt do that at the time to try again later. Then hit back, to be booted out... wow.

The UI is clunky, the controls are flakey, the notifications are not delivered reliably... but at least it worked! Now it does nothing but insist that I'm running a "modified" (i.e., rooted) version of Android -- which I'm NOT -- and exit right away. I'd give it 0 stars and a middle finger if I could. ü§¨ Completely useless now.

It's really difficult to use, their symbols are basically useless as they have almost no relationship to what they're supposed to indicate. The app always seems to vanish, if you switch momentarily to another app (like, to copy some text to insert into this app)... it's a ridiculously difficult and frustrating app to use! I spent almost 40 years designing&developing dozens of UIs for applications running on a wide array of different kinds of displays, including mobile platforms. This is awful

If I could give this app a 0, I would! I tried to log in and of course it said I had the wrong information.. I reset my password and got an email to make sure my username was correct. Went through the verification code process three times and still unable to login even using easy login. I have the doctor's code but unless I can log in I can't access my information. I tried to submit a ticket and they want the name of my doctor.. and although I have the doctors code I don't have his name because it was a radiologist from a test I took. Tried to submit help and I can't get the code to change to other, it stays on forgot my password. So even if I get my ticket submitted it won't help and there is no email address where I can send information directly about this problem. I have tried to use this app before and had the same problem. It won't show both of my doctors either. This is not due to a tech savvy problem either.. Without the ability to submit the correct problem I will never be able to get this fixed

Overall, this is a straightforward app used to track your medical information, contact your doctor, and remind oneself of dates and other data. I find it easily accessible! I would like to see a little bit more flexibility as far as being able to respond to communications to and from my medical providers without having to generate an entirely new communication! Thank you,

title: Cartoon Network App
description:
Catch up on the latest full episodes (available the day after they air!) and tons of other awesome videos in the Emmy¬Æ award winning Cartoon Network App!

ALL YOUR FAVORITE SHOWS IN ONE PLACE
Watch episodes from hit Cartoon Network shows like Teen Titans Go!, The Amazing World of Gumball, Steven Universe, Infinity Train, We Bare Bears, Craig of the Creek, Ben 10, Clarence, and many more.

WATCH YOUR OWN CUSTOM MIX 
Tell us which shows you like, and we'll build a personalized video mix full of the latest episodes just for you.

SEE UNLOCKED EPISODES‚ÄîNO LOGIN REQUIRED
Enjoy a selection of full-length episodes from your favorite Cartoon Network shows without any login or authentication. Download the free app and start watching! Just look for the episodes without a key. (Episodes with a key still require your TV provider info.)

APP EXCLUSIVE PREMIERES
Get ahead of the game by watching exclusive premiere episodes before they even hit the air. See it first on the app!
 
Get all your favorite shows on the go with the free CARTOON NETWORK APP!
 
Participating TV providers include AT&T, Charter Spectrum, Cox, Dish, Frontier, Mediacom, PlayStation Vue, Verizon, Xfinity, and many more.

********************

If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact us at help@cartoonnetwork.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using.

********************

IMPORTANT CONSIDERATIONS:
* This app may contain ads that feature other products, services, shows or offers from Cartoon Network and our partners.
* Adults must authenticate with their cable or satellite TV provider info to view locked episodes.

PRIVACY INFORMATION: 
Your privacy is important to us at Cartoon Network, a division of Turner Broadcasting System, Inc.  This game collects and uses information as described in Cartoon Network‚Äôs Privacy Policy linked below.  This information may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content; serve advertising; perform network communications; manage and improve our products and services; and perform other internal operations of Cartoon Network web sites or online services.  Our privacy practices are guided by data privacy laws in the United States. For users residing in the EU or other countries outside the U.S., please note that this app may use persistent identifiers for game management purposes.  By downloading this application, you accept our Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement, and you give permission for such uses for all users of your device.  The Privacy Policy and End User License Agreement are in addition to any terms, conditions or policies imposed by your wireless carrier and Google, Inc. Cartoon Network and its affiliates are not responsible for any collection, use, or disclosure of your personal information by Google or your wireless carrier.

Terms of Use: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/termsofuse.html
Privacy Policy: http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/legal/privacy/mobile.html
