comments: I dont understand if it's a problem with my Cable or TV provider (like at&t) but I wont allow me to log in. I've tried deleting and reinstalling it, I've tried to restart my device but it still wont work. I'll give it one star due to you still being able to watch some episodes of some shows. But if the big isn't fixed then the app will not be as great as it was befor

The worst streaming app I ever used. Getting to season episode lists is convoluted. It stops casting if your phone locks. Sometimes the app randomly goes away while casting, and if you open the app, it starts playing another episode of something. If someone calls you while casting you can't easily pause it, what a mess. Just terrible!!

Currently there is a bug where the app will crash if you try and sign in to your cable provider, which is obviously a big problem. Some other minor issues are a UI which is poorly optimized for anything outside of 16:9 and a lack of an option to pay to remove ads, and you've got yourself a bit of a stinker honestly. This would normally deserve 3 stars but the bug is worth docking an extra one since that's major functionality.

HORRIBLE! ABSOLUTE TRASH! only gives you like 2 episodes for each show. The ones that ARE unlocked are in the middle of the season! When I try to log in, the app crashes! Tried to log into it on my Roku tv, but after I completed the online activation, it still didn't log in! DONT INSTALL THIS APP! IT IS AN ABSOLUTE WASTE OF STORAGE!

There are pros and cons. pros: the shows are pretty fun and cool. you can't always watch them on other apps. cons: it usually malfunctions and it's REALLY frustrating. And it takes such a long time to log in! and it's confusing and annoying.

title: Udemy - Online Courses
description:
Udemy is an online learning platform featuring 130,000+ video courses taught by expert instructors. Take courses in anything from programming languages like Python, and Java to personal development classes like design, drawing, writing and yoga. Join the more than 40 million students who are mastering new skills, advancing their careers, and exploring new hobbies on Udemy.

LEARN ANYTHING: Discover courses in over 2,000 topics - from coding and data science to marketing, Photoshop, yoga, and more. New courses, on cutting-edge topics like machine learning, artificial intelligence, and blockchain, are continuously refreshed. 

LEARN AFFORDABLY: Udemy has both free and paid courses within your budget. Once you‚Äôve enrolled in a course, you‚Äôll have lifetime access to the content. 

LEARN FROM EXPERTS: Be inspired by 50,000+ expert instructors teaching in 60+ different languages.

LEARN ANYWHERE: Download courses to learn offline. On the go? Listen to courses in audio-only mode. 

LEARN AT YOUR OWN PACE: Ask both students and instructors questions. Personalize your learning experience with speed controls and closed captioning. 

Free and paid courses available in:
- Development: web development, programming languages (Python, Java, JavaScript, Ruby, Swift, C# & more), game development, coding basics, coding bootcamps, etc.

- Business: Finance, financial analysis, entrepreneurship, public speaking, presentation skills, writing, etc. Plus, data & analytics (SQL, machine learning, deep learning, data science & more). 

- IT & Software: IT certification, network & security, cyber security, CCNA, etc.

- Office Productivity: Microsoft, Apple, Google, SAP, Oracle, etc.

- Personal Development: productivity, leadership, personal finance, career development, study skills, etc.

- Design: drawing, web design, graphic design, design tools (Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator & more), UX design, UI design, design thinking, etc.

- Marketing: Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Search Engine Optimization(SEO), social media marketing, marketing fundamentals, mobile marketing, content marketing, product marketing, etc.

- Lifestyle: arts & crafts, travel, gaming, dog training, etc.

- Photography: digital photography, photography tools, commercial photography, video design, etc.

- Health & Fitness: yoga, nutrition, meditation, self-defense, etc.

- Teacher Training: online course creation, presentation skills, instructional design, etc.

- Music: instruments (guitar, piano & more), music fundamentals, music techniques, music software, etc.

- Languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, etc.

comments: The lessons are good but the servers of this app are non-existent. The video keeps on buffering after every 4 or 5 seconds even though others apps work smoothly with the same network connection. The same is true for the Udemy website. It becomes frustrating after a certain time and the excitement to learn vanishes. I kept waiting for an hour to watch a 16 minute lesson and wasn't able to complete it. It was either a problem with the lesson or the Udemy server. It keeps on buffering.

Works great but facing problems while playing videos and opening pdf lessons of my course at times. The videos get stuck displaying a message telling me to play the videos from my computer instead. It isn't a connectivity issue. The pdfs simply refuse to open while the ones on my phone open as usual. Moreover, this app works well only on high speed connection. When connected to the WiFi the video playback speed drastically reduces. I hope the problems get resolved soon. Thank you Udemy

Hello Udemy team, I have an issue regarding the screen resolution. I cannot watch the videos in full screen body ratio. The width of the videos are fixed to certain level. And we cannot even zoom. As you can see when I play a video in YouTube. I can get Full screen display ratio. It would be better user experience. If you update it to the full screen size ratio. and also great helpful for mobile user's. Please look into it and let me know. Thank you. Kind regards.

Please can someone explain why my course downloading is not effective. Each time I try to download a new course, the downloading starts from a previous course that I've already completed before. Is there any way I can correct this? However I've been enjoying the use of this App, this download issue is my only challenge. Please assist.

I like the app but there are a few glitches I am facing recently. They are, 1) Even after downloading the whole course I am unable to view it when my internet is turned off or my phone is in poor network zone. 2) Recently I have bought a new course but I am unable to make the course offline, the download button does not work. Hoping to hear on a resolution soon for you. Thanks & Regards, Kevin Rodrigues

comments: Just used this app to scan a QR code with the intention of uninstalling immediately after. I downloaded and opened the app and what do you know, no disruptive ads, splendid! Thank you for making this experience easy for me.
I just got this for a few things. But it's honestly fantastic, the ads are unobtrusive and it works great.
So far the only qr code app that can scan and open website links while other apps just got error msg. It may take some time to scan, otherwise it is a reasonably good app
This is awesome! I remember when the cue cat came out and this is 10 times better
Just downloaded this QR code app to tryout for first time. So far no problems! Hopefully I will continue to have success using this app as my QR app choice.

title: Google
description:
The Google app keeps you in the know about things that matter to you. Find quick answers, explore your interests, and stay up to date with Discover. The more you use the Google app, the better it gets.

Search and browse:
- Nearby shops and restaurants
- Live sports scores and schedules
- Movies times, casts, and reviews
- Videos and images
- News, stock information, and more
- Anything you‚Äôd find on the web

Get personalized updates in Discover*:
- Stay in the know about topics that interest you
- Start your morning with weather and top news
- Get updates on sports, movies, and events
- Know as soon as your favorite artists drop new albums
- Get stories about your interests and hobbies
- Follow interesting topics, right from Search results

Unstable connection?
- Google will automatically optimize results to improve loading on bad connections
- If Google cannot complete a Search, you‚Äôll get a notification with the search results once you regain connection

Learn more about what the Google app can do for you: http://www.google.com/search/about
*some features of Discover might not be available in all countries

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Use voice commands while navigating ‚Äì even when your device has no connection. Try saying "cancel my navigation" "what's my ETA?" or "what's my next turn?"
‚Ä¢ Weak connection? If your search fails, the Google app will deliver you results once you regain connection.
‚Ä¢ Troubleshoot connectivity issues with more helpful error cards when your search fails because your device is offline
‚Ä¢ It's easier to access privacy settings from the homescreen. Just tap your Google Account profile picture.
comments: Every update for the last two(?) years has said it's for the exact same reason. So... what IS going on, because this "What's my ETA?" BS is as annoying as Facebook's "information not provided by developer". With all of the data mining you do that we cannot opt out of, we at least deserve a new description on the update, even if it's bogus. At the very least, amuse us with the "details"- we all know we have no choice BUT to allow update or go back to flip phone! Which is becoming very appealing!

title: All Email Access with call screening
description:
All Email Access is an email app for Android that allows you to connect to your multiple email accounts from a single app ‚Äì it also creates a powerful link between mail and phone calls, and identifies callers, with mail options directly from the caller ID screen.

In this fast-moving mobile age, you need quick email login access and better ways to manage your inbox. This easy to use e-mail app simplifies email login and allows you to manage various email accounts with a single click. 

What sets All Email Access apart from other email apps is the smart Caller ID. It identifies callers in real-time, even if the caller isn‚Äôt in your phonebook. The link between calls and emails means you can also easily and instantly send emails to the caller or access your emails directly after the call ends. 

This app will strongly enhance your mobile communication and productivity.

What you get in this app:

- Super easy all email access: Universal email client lets you access all emails in one simple mail app (compatible with a large number of different mobile email providers).
- ID Caller: Each time you receive a call you will see the caller‚Äôs details. 
- Easy email access from the caller ID screen allows you to mail the caller quickly.
- Save contacts: Save unknown incoming contacts with one click after each call.
- Make it your own: You can easily adjust caller ID to your preferences in the app settings.
- Overview of call history: Call log and instant access to your phonebook in the app.
- Dedicated customer support ‚Äì Our dedicated customer support team will ensure you have great functionality from amazing features.

title: Google Docs
description:
Create, edit and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. With Docs you can:
 
 - Create new documents or edit existing files
 - Share documents and collaborate in the same document at the same time.
 - Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
 - Add and respond to comments.
 - Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type.
 - Research, right in Docs with Explore
 - Open, edit and save Word documents.
 
 Permissions Notice
 Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
 Storage: This is used to save and open files on USB or SD storage.

comments: This is my go to for writing any chapters for stories. Like it easily backs it all up so I don't have to worry about manually backing it up. It's very good with offline abilities too. Usually I have had apps crash or lag on me but this app did not do either. Quick on the go tools you can use as well as a few fonts. One small flaw and that is when I try to sometimes copy a specific section it won't let me. That has only happened to me a few time though.

Great app, however when ever you switch to desktop the actual document's layout is different. The whole purpose of the app is to have it on the go and add pictures from your phone. There are no pages in the app so when you move to the desktop version the layout is different. It needs to have the desktop features like showing references and pages.

Not a good app to use in android. There are a lot of cursor problems and when you click on the backspace button, the cursor moves to another line and starts deleting words. Has a lot of good templates, no doubt, but this app has to have some debugs for the problems faced by users using android.

I'm using this app to write, it was great, easy to navigate through the app.. spellcheck is superior love the update, explore options while still app is a game changer, although, i wish there's night/ dark mode because i have trouble writing when the screen went to bright üîÜ. overall, satisfying app

Very convenient app, but a lot is missing or hard to access, such as font and spellcheck. It would be nice if you could double-tap or tap and hold a word to bring up the spellcheck instead of going into the menu each time, or if you could choose what formatting elements to have above your keyboard.

title: Samsung Internet Browser
description:
New Features for you 
* Browser Extensions (Galaxy Store Required)
We introduce general purpose Browser Extensions, such as Mate Translate. These can be installed from the Galaxy Store to bring even more features to the powerful Web Browser. Tap ‚ÄúAdd-ons‚Äù in the menu to learn more.

* Tab Bar for Phone
You can now enable a tab bar beneath the URL bar to see open tabs, like on desktop web browsers. This can be turned on under the "Appearance" menu.

* Video Assistant
Video Assistant is back to support you to enjoy video watching experience more than ever. With the purple floating button, you can easily change to watch as full-screen or popup-screen.

* Customize menu
You can relocate buttons on bottom toolbar as you like. All of buttons in ‚Äòmore‚Äô menu will be the candidates.

* Tab Manager Renewal
Try our newly decorated list-view mode of Tab Manager.

Security & Privacy
Samsung Internet helps you protect your security and privacy while browsing the Internet.

* Smart Anti-Tracking
Intelligently identify domains which have cross-site tracking ability and block storage (cookie) access.

* Protected Browsing
We will warn you before you can view known malicious sites to prevent you from visiting web sites which may try to steal your data.

* Content Blockers
Samsung Internet for Android allows 3rd party apps to provide filters for content blocking, making browsing safer and more streamlined.

Engine Version
We are using Chromium 75 as the browser engine.

The following permissions are required for the app service.
For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
none

Optional permissions
Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for app analysis information
Location: Used to provide location-based content requested by the user or location information requested by the webpage in use
Camera: Used to provide webpage shooting function and QR code shooting function
Microphone: Used to provide recording function on webpage
Contacts: Used to get the device account information for cloud sync
Storage: Used to store files when downloading from webpages

If your system software version is lower than Android 6.0, please update the software to configure App permissions.
Previously allowed permissions can be reset on Apps menu in device Settings after software update.

Your anime adventures are about to begin!

comments: The mobile version of this app is frustrating. It's great when it decides to work but 95% of the time, the app wont load, when it does load and play a video, it is constantly freezing. It also will freeze and then skip back by itself and replay audio that has past and then start playing again just to freeze again. Can we please have someone look into this and actually fix it????!!!

I'm sorry but this is ridiculous. The episodes. Don't play without glitches, if they play at all. One minute I can watch on my TV, the next I can't. Then there's the mobile app, which is a total loss. But what is REALLY effing annoying and weird, is that an episode is English dubbed one second, and Japanese subbed the next. And it happens, WHILE YOU'RE watching!!! I appreciate funimarion for providing fans with dub options, but the app is a disaster. And the website is even worse.

App needs work. Clicking on things like "recently add" takes you to list that keeps refreshing when you get to the end. What looks like 100s of shows is really just the same 15 shows repeated again and again. Click on a show and going back takes you all the way to the top of the list. There is also video playback issues... forever to load, pause and can't continue. Want to go back or skip forward a few seconds, nope, video stops working. Overall just a poor UI. Also needs a night mode.

This is my second review. I noticed you respond regularly to these however instead of "talk to customer support", "sorry you're having a bad time." and shrugging off doing something about it put some effort into fixing the app or just take it down. You have all the clear consistent information you need to figure it out: laggy, freezes, slow, bad resolution ect. It's not us it's you and we would dearly love for you to fix it so we can actually enjoy the content you provide.

I have this app on my phone, it's really awesome. I love it, but it won't let me subscribe even on the website, and I would like to. Sometimes when I go to a different page it's just blank, and I have to start all over. Not all the episodes of some anime are in English and I'm not really into reading subtitles so I have started some and don't finish. Other than that I deal with it and will continue watching, and trying to subscribe.

title: News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today
description:
Get breaking news, local & world news today directly on your home screen with News Home! News home is a launcher application powered by your Local & World news providers to keep you informed about your news interests! 



Go beyond news with additional features: the News Home launcher includes themes, games, popular videos, a -1 screen with breaking news, all conveniently added to your home screen for quick access.



You can use News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today to stay up-to-date on daily breaking news, local news headlines and weather news, world news events, trending videos and anything you are interested in. With convenient one swipe access to your favorite news sources it‚Äôs a simple and convenient upgrade to your boring stock home screen! 



News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today provides thousands of trusted local and global news sources to personalize your own news feed around your interests. All in one great home screen app & totally FREE. Are we missing your favorite news source? Submit it through our feedback form and we‚Äôll try to add it in for you! 



 

Important Features 



Stay Informed - Never Miss Breaking News  

üì∞ Don‚Äôt miss the news on big events like breaking political news, local severe weather or great local events. 

üì∞ Stay informed on world news, national news, local news, celebrity news, sports news and weather news.  

üì∞ You‚Äôll always have today‚Äôs breaking news, globally and locally delivered directly to your phone.  



Stay Focused ‚Äì News content tailored to your personal interests  

üì∞ With thousands of news sources to choose from you can stay up-to-date on just about any topic that you‚Äôre interested in! 

üì∞ Select news from local sports teams to world news topics with News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today‚Äôs premium featured news content.  



Videos & Games ‚Äì Enjoy More Content  

üì∞ When you want to take an entertainment break from the local news find free instant games included just like your newspaper‚Äôs crossword puzzle. 

üì∞ Checkout hot trending videos or search for a video for all your interests ‚Äì curated from around the web. 



Trusted Sources ‚Äì Only the Best Content for Our Readers  

üì∞ We‚Äôve streamlined the news reading experience to give you content on the topics you care about and put it right on your easy to use Home screen. 



 

üì∞ You can choose from any of these curated topics or select your own individual sources:  



- Breaking Top News 

- Local News 

- National News 

- World News 

- Business News 

- Technology News  

- Science News  

- Sports News  

- Entertainment News  

- Health News  



 

Explore breaking news, viral videos and enjoy a reading experience fully customized to your interests! Subscribe to every niche interest you have and enjoy personalized news from News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today!  



Download today and stay informed on world news and local news!  



FAQ:  

How do I make my reading experience more personalized?  

News Home: Breaking News, Local & World News Today has a quick setup screen that will allow you to pick your favorite news sources. The feed comes set to standard sources with the ability to add and drop local news and national news sources.

comments: 1 is too high. Downloaded app and got 4 others as a "bonus". Completely reorganized my screens. Can't uninstall them so they are disabled. Sounds like a great app, but I hate it!
It just keeps bouncing me back and forth between two icons!
It changed everything on my phone! It won't give me option to uninstall the app. Worst app ever! I want my phone back to the way I had it set up before installing the app and I can't!
Very informative, and up to date with great writing and stories relative to today's world
Just as it says you can watch the news update at anytime.

title: Samsung Experience Service
description:
Samsung Experience Service is an app that includes a variety of features provided by Samsung.

This app is preloaded on Samsung Galaxy devices by default. It allows you to use multiple Samsung apps, such as Samsung Health, Samsung Pay, Galaxy Apps, Samsung Members, and SmartThings, with your Samsung account credentials. It also provides a user verification service.

Using your Samsung Cloud and Samsung account shared groups, you can also share a diverse range of content through preloaded Samsung apps, such as Calendar, Samsung Notes, Reminder, Gallery, and Contacts.

Samsung Experience Service ensures a quicker and more convenient user verification process through continuous updates. It also provides a feature that enables you to connect different Samsung apps with Samsung products.

Samsung Experience Service provides the following main features:

-. The ability to sign in to Samsung apps with your Samsung account
-. Samsung account's Sharing groups feature
-. Profile sharing in the Contacts app
-. Shared albums in the Gallery app
-. Family calendar in the Calendar app
-. Shared notebooks in the Samsung Notes app
-. Family reminders in the Reminder app

* You can change your Samsung account settings by going to Settings and then selecting Profile at the top of the screen.
* Note:

   -. The features that each member of your group can use to share content on their device may vary, depending on the version of their Samsung Experience Service app. The new feature that is used to share content between family members is available from the latest versions of the Calendar, Samsung Notes, and Reminder apps.
   -. Samsung Experience Service versions
               10.0 or earlier: Create a family group or general groups, and use the Shared albums feature in the Gallery app.
               10.1 or later: Use Family calendar, Family reminders, and Shared notebooks for your family group as well as Shared notebooks for general groups.

* If Samsung Experience Service is disabled or not updated when required, then some features of Samsung apps may not work properly.

comments: Keeps annoying me to sign in with a Samsung account when I do not want to. I dismiss the noticication, only to have it reappear seconds later. It does not let me disable notifications for it, nor uninstall or disable it. This is a dirty underhanded tactic by Samsung to coerce me to sign in and allow them to better collect data from my phone. I do not appreciate this and has sullied my otherwise positive opinion of Samsung. Please rethink your decision to try and force me into signing in!

Hate it, you want everything from me just so you get my contacts and can get info. This app blows big time. If I don't allow this Samsung app my phone, sms etc doesn't work right. My sim is with a phone company, not you. I used to like samsung but now your greedy just like FB, google,twitter,all of you.ill find another app and delete all.

Just another bloatware app I do not want, Samsung love your phones, but allow us to take any of yours or say Facebook's bloatware off my phone! I own my phone, so why can't I remove all this junk? You cannot turn off the background function on your apps which most I dont use and they just suck up battery power. Same with a fair amount of the other unwanted apps that can't be removed. This app is useless to me and just a way for you folks to gather marketing info on me, not nice!

I keep getting a notification to continue using services securely sign in again. But when I do it just sends me back to the sign in screen. I can sign in from other devices no problem but on this phone it just says process failed and goes back to sign in screen.

For the past 3 weeks, I have been receiving a pop up error message "Samsung experience keeps stopping" and this happens more than 5 times in a second which makes it impossible for me to use my phone. This on it's own will make me change phone brands. Its nonsense!

title: Canvas Student
description:
Access your Canvas courses on the go with the Canvas Student mobile app! From any device, students can now:

‚Ä¢ View grades and course content
‚Ä¢ Submit assignments
‚Ä¢ Keep track of course work with to do list and calendar
‚Ä¢ Send and receive messages

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: If I could would rate between 4 and 3. The app works rather well a majority of the time but there are 2 specific drawbacks that each takes away about 1 star. First, The ability to customize, organizing in a way that makes it easier for the user to access what is most relevant, is present but not prevalent and certainly has potential to expand. Second, A majority of Extinctions and tools do not work. I've used this app for 4 years, and it has improved greatly and would like it to keep growing :)

This app is great!! I have used this app for almost 2 years and it has always been my savior in turning things in and remembering to do homework. Most, if not all, of the professors use this app, and so do the others at the school I'm transferring to this fall. Canvas is super easy to use on both android phones and computers.

The App is bonkers af, bruh. The lectures when you try to open them? Doesn't load, and downloading them is such a chore, so slow even if you have stable connection to the internet. Notifications is meh, and vague af. And the most infuriating of all is the submission stages. Like... What. In. The. World. Even. Is. This. Many Uni might've used this App up to now, but this App is mediocre at best, does its job, but having their executions flopped.

Definitely not the best app. It is convenient if you want to see your assignments but does not work 100%. The notifications barely work. I can't highlight anything in the text which is extremely important to me for creating notes. It needs a lot of work or a great update.

In my previous review, I stated the app was broken. But, as of a few days ago, with little fanfare, the app was fixed. A little late, but better late than never, I guess. The app works fine, but I'm still a little sour about the app being broken for so long.

title: Telehealth by SimplePractice
description: Our 100% secure and HIPAA compliant video app for clients and clinicians. Start video appointments instantly, with no logins or passwords to manage.
descriptionHTML: Our 100% secure and HIPAA compliant video app for clients and clinicians. Start video appointments instantly, with no logins or passwords to manage.
summary: Secure, HIPAA-compliant video
recentChanges:
Thanks for using Telehealth by SimplePractice! Our app is updated regularly to ensure that you have the best experience.
The latest update includes a new refreshed design and requires video call participants to identify themselves.
comments: Quality was excellent but the battery drain was severe and my phone heated up to the point where it began to throttle itself and was difficult to touch. Battery monitor reported that it ate 50% of my battery in about 40 minutes. Needs a little bit of work and then easily 5 stars
Very poor video kept freezing and distorted. Needs work! Sad! I was looking forward to seeing my provider and it was a bad feed! :(

I'm not sure everyone here realizes how this app works? I have the app installed, but my therapist has to give me my own URL to open our specific video chat, otherwise it won't really show anything. We have to be logged on at the same time. I have chats with my therapist on this every other week for the last year and a half. I did not find my therapist on this app, it's only a tool we use. My only complaint is sometimes it freezes or there's no sound.

I was able to connect to therapist once app installed yet my volume would not work? I attempted to make sure all my volume features were on max on my phone and I was not muted on video. I gave the app permission to access everything it needed when downloaded. Did I Miss Something in instructions regarding sound?
Maybe the system was down for a few hours, but I was able to finally get the app downloaded, and it worked as advertised. The review has been updated to reflect that

title: Samsung My Files
description:
[Introducing My Files]
  "My Files" manages all the files on your smartphone, just like a file explorer on your computer.
  You can also manage files stored on SD cards, USB drives and files in the cloud storage connected with your smartphone at the same time.
  Download and experience "My Files" now.  

 [New features in My Files]
  1. Free up storage space easily by tapping the "Storage Analysis" button on the main screen.
  2. You can hide any unused storage space from the main screen via the "Edit My Files home".  
  3. You can view long file names without ellipses using the "Listview" button.

 [Key features]
  - Browse and manage files stored on your smartphone, SD card, or USB drive conveniently.
   .Users can create folders; move, copy, share, compress, and decompress files; and view file details.

  - Try our user-friendly features.
   .The Recent Files list: Files the user has downloaded, run, and/or opened
   .The Categories list: Types of files, including downloaded, document, image, audio, video, and installation files (.APK)
   .Folder and file shortcuts: Show on the device home screen and the My Files main screen
   .Provides a function used to analyze and free up storage space.

  - Enjoy our convenient Cloud services.
   .Samsung Cloud Drive
   .Google Drive
   .OneDrive

  ‚Äª Supported features may be different depending on models.

comments: Up until recently this has been my all time favorite file manager, I've been able to code, script, alter files, organize; you name it. Everything is easily able to be done. But recently the ability to select a choice of options when holding down on a item, has had no effect. Nothing appears when I hold my finger down to either look at the details or edit an item. It simply shows it's selected but denies the option to let me alter it. Please fix this bug, as it's very annoying to see.

Despite the Android 10 update, the issue still persist. Currently using Samsung S10 Plus. In Internal storage, my files are sorted by name, in ascending order and list view. When I click to view a file in full screen and then swipe either left/right to view the next/previous file, the files are not sorted accordingly. It is still sorted by default i.e. date created and descending. Pls rectify soon. Thanks.

After the newest update to Android 10 applications (such as Firefox) that download files (such as .PDF) have a pop-up at the bottom of the screen (says: "Open"); that always fails. If instead I use the pulldown Notification that fails too. Only by going directly to the File Manager, navigating to the "Download" directory, and clicking on the downloaded file does the subsequent 'Open With' pop-up work correctly. --- So I suspect that a 'tweak update' will be coming in a few weeks.

A most unhelpful app. Constantly bothering me about running out of space, a fault of Android and Samsung installing apps I neither need or want and stupidly refusing to use the installed SD card for storage. It offers no useful solutions for the onboard memory running out and instead wastes time and processor on telling me about duplicate files in places that aren't running out of space. I've not installed a new app in months but suddenly now I'm running out of space.

Its good app, but suddenly my sdcard is not working even I use card reader at the same time, its not working properly its just make my files disappear and cant open it, its instructing me to download an app on playstore its not helpful though. These problem arise before i update my samsung files i thought it will work if i update but its still the same. Dont know if its my samsung phone or what ever. Its make me sad to just buy another phone but im pissed to the gone files

title: Meijer

comments: Very confusing to navigate. Kept bringing up Easter dinner items. In the beginning the only choice was to add to list but when I was finished there was no list and nothing in my cart so I had to keep looking around until I was finally in the section to add to my cart then had to redo all my items. Very confusing app. I wouldn't be using if we weren't staying in since we are older and told to stay home.

3/20/20 Unable to start shop and scan. Last update was 3/18/20. How long does it take to fix the issue? If you can't fix it, why not go to the previous version that was working? Why not at least place a pop-up message in the shop and scan screen that the issue is known and is being taken care of. Would save a lot of time and frustration to your customers.

I have loved this app in the past, it had made shopping so easy. Unfortunately, I and many others have complained that the shop and scan feature isn't working. I don't see any helpful responses from the app builders on how to fix the issues, just more people, like myself, posting our frustration and asking for the app to be fixed. PLEASE, fix the issues as soon as possible.

App not working properly. I tried signing in and out several times, turning my phone off and back on but neither worked. I uninstalled and reinstalled the app but haven't had the opportunity to try using it again. Now for some reason I'm unable to move the app icon to my phone's home screen. Frustrating.

Self Scan option wouldn't move past the "How To" slides making the service unavailable until I uninstalled and reinstalled. Even after that, while doing a barcode search, it tells me "barcode dependencies are not yet available, ensure device storage is not low and try again"even though I have plenty of available memory and have allowed all permissions for this app

title: Digital Wellbeing
description:
See a complete picture of your digital habits and disconnect when you want to.

Get a daily view of your digital habits:
‚Ä¢ How frequently you use different apps
‚Ä¢ How many notifications you receive
‚Ä¢ How often you check your phone or unlock your device

Disconnect when you want to:
‚Ä¢ Daily app timers let you set limits for how much you use apps.
‚Ä¢ Wind Down reminds you to switch off at night, setting a schedule to fade your screen to Grayscale while Do Not Disturb silences notifications for a good night‚Äôs sleep.
‚Ä¢ Focus mode lets you pause distracting apps with a single tap so you can better focus your time. You can also set a schedule to turn on Focus mode automatically and reduce distractions while you‚Äôre at work, school, or home.

Get started:
‚Ä¢ Look for Digital Wellbeing in your phone‚Äôs Settings menu

Have a question? Check out the Help Center: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/9137850
descriptionHTML:
See a complete picture of your digital habits and disconnect when you want to.

Get a daily view of your digital habits:
‚Ä¢ How frequently you use different apps
‚Ä¢ How many notifications you receive
‚Ä¢ How often you check your phone or unlock your device

Disconnect when you want to:
‚Ä¢ Daily app timers let you set limits for how much you use apps.
‚Ä¢ Wind Down reminds you to switch off at night, setting a schedule to fade your screen to Grayscale while Do Not Disturb silences notifications for a good night‚Äôs sleep.
‚Ä¢ Focus mode lets you pause distracting apps with a single tap so you can better focus your time. You can also set a schedule to turn on Focus mode automatically and reduce distractions while you‚Äôre at work, school, or home.

Get started:

Have a question? Check out the Help Center: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/9137850
summary: Improve your wellbeing and disconnect more easily
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Focus mode is available to everyone
‚Ä¢ Flip to Shhh is available on Pixel 2, 3 and 4
comments: Needs to inform the user on a more regular basis about how much they're using their phone. What happens now is: you ise an app too much (say you've set a timer of 25 minutes for that specific app) and then at minute 24 you get a notification that you used up all of your time... Would be better if it were at 15, 20 and 24 minutes imho Great step in the right direction, though, to make people more aware of how (much) time they are wasting/spending staring at their phone

Very good app for protecting users against addiction of smartphone and helps to disconnect while doing important work. Also it gives data of how much you use certain apps and helps to keep the time limit for that app. It pauses distracting app when you are on focus mode. It is the best app to let you sleep peacefully and stops all the notifications. But still waiting for more features in the upcoming updates.

This application is good, but when I play Pubg, so ok I have about an hour and a half, but when I listen to Spotify (about one hour) I look back and it doesn't write anything to me. how much do I have on my mobile and say "ahe" my boy was on Pubg again for an hour and a half (and then he doesn't see that I was on Spotify anymore). And I'll tell you that I've tried it at least five times, and it never showed that Spotify!

This has proven to be very beneficial to me in the mornings before work, when my phone is loaded with a ton of unimportant notifications. There are some bugs, though, and I'd like to file a bug report with the devs if possible (e.g. the push notification can't be cleared after it's issued, no matter the status value attached to it).

Everything is cool and all but there are a lot of very essential features missing from this one. Not to compare or anything but this needs to have a weekly stat showing average usage, % of usage increased or decreased compared to last or previous weeks and categories in which one can manually choose apps to put in and have it somewhat like screen time. (Although categories isn't something very useful) But please consider having weekly average usage stat and % of usage increased or decreased.

title: Hangouts Meet
description:
Simple, frictionless, and high quality video meetings by Google. Collaborate and build relationships with your team and partners regardless of where you are in the world.

    Key features include:
    ‚Ä¢ High-definition video and audio meetings with up to 250* participants
    ‚Ä¢ Real-time captions powered by Google speech-to-text technology
    ‚Ä¢ Easy access - just share a link and anyone can join with one click from desktop or mobile
    ‚Ä¢ International dial-in numbers to any meeting for team members who prefer to call in
    ‚Ä¢ Integration with Calendar for seamless scheduling and easy access to meeting details and calendar attachments from your Meet video call

    Anyone can join a meeting on Meet through an invite, however, some capabilities are available only to G Suite customers.

    *Available only in G Suite Enterprise Edition
descriptionHTML:
Simple, frictionless, and high quality video meetings by Google. Collaborate and build relationships with your team and partners regardless of where you are in the world.

summary: Simple, frictionless video meetings for G Suite from Hangouts
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Improved support for 250 person meetings
‚Ä¢ Real-time captions
‚Ä¢ International dial-in numbers for any meeting
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: The app is alright. When the presenter's connection is terrible we are never able to see the screen and such. However, if their connection is good, then the quality is actually not bad. Although, I would like the creators to add a ‚Äú(s/b) is typing...‚Äù bubble when someone is typing. This will prevent any unnecessary anger grunts from our teachers when the class is not answering their questions, even when someone is typing as fast as possible.

Has worked flawlessly for me for quite a while. Lately, sound quality is even decent on low bandwidth connections. Audio can be difficult to understand if presenters use cheap phone microphones and stand far away, but you can't blame the service for that.

App is great, but the output volume is too loud on earphones even when my phone volume is set to it's minimum. I have to take my earphones out and set them near my ear to have the app not screech into my eardrums. An option to adjust output volume in-app would be really useful.

Chaotic, laggy, plain unorganized. Do not get this. I was excited the first time I saw this app, now I know I'm being led to dread whenever I see it. Its just crazy to the limits. That morning I had art class, I couldn't hear anything and even when I could it was bad quality. I had to sit there for about four hours listening to the disturbing sounds of people shouting and voices lagging. If you ask me, that was a one star experience.If you think this app is good by the outside think again.

I don't even understand how Google's own app doesn't work on Android. Every time I try to join a Hangouts meetup, I get an error message and cannot join. Re-installed and re-started phone to no avail. This app deserves negative stars. OnePlus 7 Pro

title: Maps - Navigate & Explore
description:
Navigate your world faster and easier with Google Maps.  Over 220 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of businesses and places on the map.  Get real-time GPS navigation, traffic, and transit info, and explore local neighborhoods by knowing where to eat, drink and go - no matter what part of the world you‚Äôre in.

Get there faster with real-time updates
‚Ä¢ Beat traffic with real-time ETAs and traffic conditions
‚Ä¢ Catch your bus, train, or ride-share with real-time transit info
‚Ä¢ Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents, and road closures

Discover places and explore like a local
‚Ä¢ Discover local restaurant, events, and activities that matter to you
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs trending and new places that are opening in the areas you care about
‚Ä¢ Decide more confidently with ‚ÄúYour match,‚Äù a number on how likely you are to like a place
‚Ä¢ Group planning made easy.  Share a shortlist of options and vote in real-time
‚Ä¢ Create lists of your favorite places and share with friends
‚Ä¢ Follow must-try places recommended by local experts, Google, and publishers
‚Ä¢ Review places you‚Äôve visited. Add photos, missing roads and places.

More experiences on Google Maps
‚Ä¢ Offline maps to search and navigate without an internet connection
‚Ä¢ Street View and indoor imagery for restaurants, shops, museums and more
‚Ä¢ Indoor maps to quickly find your way inside big places like airports, malls and stadiums

* Some features not available in all countries

recentChanges: Google Maps turns 15 years old! See the new Google Maps icon, which celebrates the app‚Äôs evolution from helping you get to places to also helping you discover the world. This birthday update includes a simplified home screen that makes it easier to find your favorite features, including your saved places, reviews, and lists. Tap your Google Account profile picture to see settings, Location Sharing, Timeline, and more.
comments: Disappointed with the update process. Ive read some reviews of users who also experienced the same issue as i did, where suddenly the Maps will not show any direction, despite already showing the result of estimated time. There were a couple of updates that it has done this and had to uninstall and reinstalll app, which, frankly, is not the most ideal. (for those wondering, clearing the cache doesnt work. And if i had to uninstall the update, what's the point of having an update)

no options on map to say stay on paved roads also comes to dead ends because of this where you can see where you need to go but you can't get there because there's no road. If there was an option to click. If there was an option to click about dirt roads. It would solve both these problems. Response to Google: You really don't know what paved roads are? And I am not returning to a place I rarely go to just so you can know what I'm talking about. Put the picture in a screenshot.

It gets me where I need to go almost perfectly. But it needs some improvements. When I have an exit or turn coming up it sometimes doesn't let me know until right before it. Even if the turn isn't for 10 miles, it'd still be nice to know when it's coming up. Also when there are two left or right turn lanes to be told which one to be in. Finally, when I look up an address it'll say one distance, but when I start the route it's a more miles away than it said it'd be.

Was working awesome for a long time! Now it absolutely sucks... Sucks so bad. The best thing the developers could do would be to swallow their pride and make the older version available. Hear me out. This version isnt better, it doesnt find routs faster and it has WAY to many buttons! Google has spent a lot of money in road mapping. Dont make it all waste.

I agree with everyone that's complaining about this new app. I have had several problems also, the blue dot jumps around, never where I'm supposed to be, my timeline is all messed up saying I've been at a certain place when I haven't .I've cleared my cache turned off my location & reset my phone again & turned back on still the same issues. Also when I do go somewhere it shows up on another day instead of that day. I've done just about everything I read in the comments section & still nothing.

comments: This is the real thing! I have been paid well over $100.00 in gift cards. at $5.00 each. they keep super detailed count of your earnings and I have never had a single problem. I could have made 4 times more had I followed their suggestion about how long to interact with each game. sometimes I would play a single game for over an hour when they had reminded me that the 4 minutes were over and went back. I have tried all of the other make money while playing, but none have come close. Kat B.

Decided since we all have a lot of time on our hands, I would give this a shot. The 1st $5 was quick & easy so I set my sites on the $25 reward. That seemed to take forever! Still, it's a nice way to get a few extra bucks in your spare time. Also, I decided instead of getting a reward for the theater maybe I should get it for Amazon with the way things are going, I might need those emergency funds for toilet paper! Lol. Seriously tho, anyone reading this, stay safe & healthy please ‚ô°

I have used a lot of apps that reward you for playing games and doing survey's but this one is by far the best one. Within the first 2 days they basically gave me a 5 dollar gift card. Additionally, a few days later I had enough to get another 5 dollar gift card! I also recently had an issue with not being rewarded my points with I the app and contacted support and they fixed the issue for me within a day and a half.

It sucks. All ur apps wont give me videos to watch. I was going good earlier. Now as usual it wont give me points. I've been trying since last july to get 1 of it 25 dollar cards. I've 7nenstalled hundreds of times, cleared all data, and restarted my phone. I've done everything any of u could possibly say for me to do and I still keep has having issues. Even hen I had my phone as brand new Las august someone told me it's my phone that's the problem. Even my moms bran new phone the app dont work.

So glad that it worked! I was using Mistplay (which is awesome, too) and decided to try this one as well. It has multiple times of day where it allows you to get more points playing multiple games for a few hours, surveys, and you can watch ads to support them and or enter a contest to get a 5 dollar gift card. The games you play though do have a limit of having to be played for at least two minutes and those points are only made once a day. But they also have "extended apps."

title: Briefing
description:
Briefing for Samsung puts what‚Äôs important at your fingertips. Swipe left on your home screen to quickly access the latest news and stories. Select all your favorite topics and get full coverage and perspectives from the world‚Äôs most credible sources. 

NEW: Flipboard TV - for a limited time, Samsung Galaxy S20 owners get exclusive access to Flipboard TV premium service. Watch high-quality videos, sourced from the best publishers - all personalized in one place and ad-free. Try free for 3 months and earn 1,000 Samsung Rewards points. Coming soon to other devices.

Briefing provides a great summary of personalized news in a beautiful package. Invest in yourself, stay informed, and feel like you‚Äôve spent your time well. Focus on what matters to you, not the random posts of other people‚Äôs lives.

You can disable Briefing by pinch zooming out on the home screen, then swipe to locate Briefing. Uncheck the box at the top, then tap to return to your home screen. If you have questions or need help, please select Contact at https://about.flipboard.com/help-center/.

recentChanges:
Briefing is now more customizable. In addition to the content you could choose from before, you can now also choose from the entire range of topics of Flipboard!

We would love to know what you think of this new version. Please give us feedback via the play store feedback option.
comments: I love Briefing! It is a great way to stay up to date with the latest news and I love getting the notifications. However, as of lately it has been asking me to accept cookies or something and I'm just not to sure what to think about that.. I have yet to accept and they still notify me with articalls. Thank you Breifing!

Oi, I found this app hidden in my phone. There doesn't seem to be a way to open it. The internet says that this was replaced by Bixby as a News Feed, and then included into it as a "card", and then Bixby was replaced by Samsung Daily. So what? Is this dead weight now? Can this be useful? Or should I just uninstall it and use Flipboard?

This app feels like bloatware that no matter how many times I remove it, it comes back. If I ever click on the push notifications (THAT I DO NOT WANT BTW) It never takes me to the article that was displayed in their notification banner, and then is impossible to find in their feed. Overall, flipbook actually makes my experience on a Samsung in general much worse because it will not go away.

Unhappy, this app came as bloatware on my phone. It. Can't be removed. I used I briefly on an old phone. I actually can't access the app through my app drawer, so can't really use, and can't remove it because it's bloatware. Upgraded review to 3 stars. This app may be useful to others who have a need for it.

App was hidden. I hadn't seen this app until I went looking for bloatware. ( I came across a hidden app called "Foundation). So I researched. Briefing is a news app. (Any news app is better than the google one. The same 15 stories for days on google). So I am changing my rating. Also, Flipboard is not factory installed, and this app was hidden so devs may want to have a word with Samsung.

comments: Terrible. You open the app and doesn't let you play. It immediately wants you to buy the pro option. You can't play unless you buy it. This makes me think that there probably isn't just a free play option. Edit: found out that this company stole parts of a vidio on YouTube for their ads. The uploader did not give permission, and it's not even the same game. This is a terrible product, and the developers should be ashamed.

Stupid touch app, lets you drag slime over the screen and charges 81$ for access to more slime. My 4 yr old has bought VIP, currently trying to gain a refund. I understand my child should have been watched a little closer, but even that aside, if I had bought this app for that much, it would still prompt a refund since the cost simply is not justified by the product. Will hopefully be able to repost a nice story soon.

I mean I with alot of people on 1 star reviews! This app is horrible you can't play it because you get bored waiting for the X so then you can get of this add wanting you to buy products!Its getting annoying coming on a app that used to be great no adds or anything but now its just ruined! I hope nobody bought that add because its a waste! Whoever made this should be ashamed!

Never got around to playing as the fact it's subscription-based put me off. Three days of free trial followed no free option but an immediate ¬£49.49, whatever it was, is ridiculous considering the potential nothingness of this game. *edit - apparently there IS a free option, however the developers have designed this (very sneakily) so that it takes a long time for the X to close down the subscribe option (according to some reviews at least).

lmao its funny how you dont even get do try it. it doesnt even deserve a 1 star, there should be none. its really funny tbh. if it were to have like, 5 options, then it would have been way better, but unfortunately, there is nothing. i expected less anyways. it looked, like not sketchy but kinda. disappointed, but defs not surprised.

title: MyChart
description:
MyChart puts your health information in the palm of your hand and helps you conveniently manage care for yourself and your family members. With MyChart you can:

‚Ä¢	Communicate with your care team.
‚Ä¢	Review test results, medications, immunization history, and other health information.
‚Ä¢	Connect your account to Google Fit to pull health-related data from your personal devices right into MyChart.
‚Ä¢	View your After Visit Summary¬Æ for past visits and hospital stays, along with any clinical notes your provider has recorded and shared with you.
‚Ä¢	Schedule and manage appointments, including in-person visits and video visits.
‚Ä¢	Get price estimates for the cost of care.
‚Ä¢	View and pay your medical bills.
‚Ä¢	Securely share your medical record from anywhere with anyone who has Internet access.
‚Ä¢	Connect your accounts from other healthcare organizations so you can see all your health information in one place, even if you've been seen at multiple healthcare organizations.
‚Ä¢	Receive push notifications when new information is available in MyChart. You can check whether push notifications are enabled under the Account Settings within the app.

Note that what you can see and do within the MyChart app depends on which features your healthcare organization has enabled and whether they‚Äôre using the latest version of Epic software. If you have questions about what‚Äôs available, contact your healthcare organization.

To access MyChart, you must create an account with your healthcare organization. To sign up for an account, download the app and search for your healthcare organization or go to your healthcare organization‚Äôs MyChart website. After you‚Äôve signed up, turn on fingerprint authentication or set up a four-digit passcode to quickly log in without needing to use your MyChart username and password each time. 
  
For more information about MyChart‚Äôs features or to find a healthcare organization that offers MyChart, visit www.mychart.com.

Have feedback about the app? Email us at mychartmobilesupport@epic.com.

recentChanges: Any scanned images you have available for test results on the MyChart website are now also available in MyChart mobile, if your healthcare organization uses the latest version of Epic.
comments: Terrible! Had tried repeatedly to log in to my account and kept getting messages there was a problem with the server - log out and try again - still didn't work after multiple times. I was finally able to log in, then I wasn't able to see my test results! Problems with the server again!! Slow to bring up med list also. I finally gave up. Please get it fixed soon!

I really like this app. Even my test results are right at my fingertips!! So much better than the Pharmacy apps!!! Plus, what a great way to communicate with anyone one my care team, or even all of them at once!! It's a safer feeling than knowing that the right person gets the right message!!

For several weeks now I've been unable to use app. When I try to login I get message, 'problem communicating with server. Please try again later' I have sent email to MyChart with NO response. I can access through web browser, Chrome. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, NO CHANGE. If the app works for you, GREAT. It doesn't work for me and MyChart isn't helping. Galaxy S8 is device.

advertised. excuse for an app. I liked the web-browser pages, just fine. Now,the app sometimes recognizes I'm on a cellphone and reflows text, etc, to fit the screen. At other times, it formats for a desktop. Finally, it's difficult to find an item you're looking for... say you want the Rx (script list) to choose from But *NO* --- your Rx LIST is one place under a topic and the "Request a Refill -or- a renewal is under a completely different topic: "connect."

App is still not accessable due to a server error on the app everytime you try to sign in.The app hasn't been working consistently for a month now. I've already reached out for help multiple times with no response - apparently others have tried as well. This needs to be fixed, you are effecting people's health and access to medical care!

title: Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows
description:
You love your phone. So does your PC. Get instant access to everything you love on your phone, right on your PC. To get started, Install the Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows app on your Android phone and link it with the Your Phone app on your Windows 10 PC.

 Reply to your text messages with ease, access your favorite mobile apps*, and receive and manage your phone's notifications on your PC. Make and receive calls** on your PC and transfer them between your devices effortlessly. Make emailing yourself photos a thing of the past as you share your favorite images between your phone and PC. And, when you need to add a recent image to your email, paper, or presentation, just drag and drop it from the Your Phone app to your PC. 


Your Phone Companion features:
‚Ä¢ Make and receive calls from your PC
‚Ä¢ Manage your Android phone's notifications on your PC 
‚Ä¢ Access your favorite mobile apps* on your PC. Enjoy your PC's bigger screen, keyboard, mouse, and touch screen.
‚Ä¢ Read and reply to your text messages from your PC
‚Ä¢ Instantly access the photos on your phone from your PC

Discover new Microsoft apps
‚Ä¢ Find apps for your phone and PC that help you seamlessly work across devices
‚Ä¢ Discover new Microsoft apps that help you be more productive, focus in school, keep up with world events, and more. Your Phone features are available for Android phones running Android 7.0 or greater. You have to link your Android Phone to your PC through the Your Phone app. 

*Requires a Windows 10 PC running the Windows 10 May 2019 Update and is available only on select Android phones. Android phone must be turned on and connected to the same WiFi network as your PC.  Here's a list of phones that are currently supported: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2066472

**Requires a Windows 10 PC running the Windows 10 May 2019 Update and with a Bluetooth radio. 

By installing this app, you agree to the Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Policy https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

Tell us what features you'd like to see next by selecting "Send feedback" in settings in the Your Phone app or the Your Phone Companion app.

summary: Get instant access to your phone's notifications, photos and texts on your PC.
recentChanges: Now you can make and receive calls on your PC and transfer them between your devices effortlessly. Tap into your PC's speakers, microphone, and larger screen for a richer calling experience. You can also now view and interact with your most recent 2,000 photos from your Android smartphone's camera roll on your PC, instead of only 25!
comments: Decent, not excellent, when it works. Utterly useless when it doesn't. Whether or not this app will sync is a bit of a coin toss. Particularly frustrating when it syncs parts of a conversation, leading to confusing replies. When it does work, it's useful but not great. The notifications for example are not clickable. In its present state I will not be keeping it. It feels like something that would be in late alpha/early beta stages. I wonder why Microsoft would allow something like this.

I couldn't change my selected email on my pc from an old school email I had once used, even after removing the account i was prompted to sign back into the same one. The trouble shooting did not help me at all, and for some, reason it will continue to say that my phone has been linked, even when not properly linked. I would remove it to try and add it again, only to see that my device was never properly removed in the first place, as not even that function seems to work. Please fix this!!!!!!!

Very nice App I love it. But there is one small issue. Sometimes it doesn't stays connected in order to synchronize so you have to start the app manually. But that's okay. Another thing which really bad is the missing support for other than standard calls. For example WhatsApp calls aren't supported. That's not good because in many regions the isn't a good cellular connection for VoLTE and the call quality of normal calls is really bad. I would love to see support for WhatsApp calls.

This is an excellent app I am now using the app to write this. This app is very usefull to access the phone with my computer. I can easily use this app to interact with my laptop programs which in the past will not be easy to do. I can also access my phone w/o looking into the phone while I am working. Also this app allows me to use a physical keyboard w/o the need to link a keyboard to my phone. Excellent app.

I left my phone in my locker at work. Battery around 80%. I come back a few hours later to find my phone is at 11%, and this app was the primary culprit. This app also consumed a TON of my data. Why? My computer wasn't even on at home! This app provides a valuable service but is not worth those pain points.

title: Adia ‚Äì Jobs on Demand
description:
Finding a job you love shouldn‚Äôt be hard. Adia makes it easy. You can book ANY job you see, with just one tap. It‚Äôs awesome, we know.

How it works: Once you download the Adia app, you‚Äôll create a profile, telling us your interests, skills, and availability. You‚Äôll go through one-and-done onboarding to get hired. Once your profile is activated, you can book any full-time, part-time, and pick-up gigs you see in the app.

We‚Äôll match you to jobs you‚Äôll love, based on your preferences. Book the jobs you want to work, and pass on the ones you don‚Äôt.  Whenever a new job is available, we‚Äôll notify you. Work as little or as much as you want - it‚Äôs 100% up to you.

Perks: as a W-2 Adia employee, you‚Äôre eligible for full-time benefits. Plus, you‚Äôll get paid every Friday.

We‚Äôve got something for everyone:

‚Ä¢ Service industry
‚Ä¢ Hospitality
‚Ä¢ Catering
‚Ä¢ Special events
‚Ä¢ General labor
‚Ä¢ Retail

Whatcha waiting for? Download Adia now and start booking gigs.

recentChanges:
You‚Äôve got all the details you need, when you need them.

No more wondering where the job is, and what you‚Äôll need to wear. You‚Äôll see exactly how many miles from home it is and the dress code in the Job Match, making it easier to decide if you want to book the gig.

Once you RSVP, you‚Äôll instantly receive a chat with the business POC, the best way to reach them, and any additional info needed before arriving.
comments: I am being forced to use this app for my pay for proctoring the SAT, nothing else.They ask for too much personal information. I've encountered several glitches. First, I could not enter my DOB, so a rep had to input it. Then I had to ask a friend to verify the info on my passport, an invasion of privacy. When I finally found someone who's willing to enter their info on the site, they were supposed to get an email asking for in person verification of my passport, but didn't get it.

Just a waste of time as the App is totally glitchy and won't allow you to book even if position/gig available. Called several times to correct/inquire the issue but no help and basically told to delete it if it didn't suit me also asked on several calls if it was personal and if I was welcomed never a straight answer and after reading the other reviews I see it's not just me and I ask why not update the app with fixes.... bad customer service!!!

My profile got deactivated after I called and ask why I was still In onboarding process.This app is not what it says. I am certified and sanitation. You will not be able to work with Adia if you do pass the phone interview you can not schedule for jobs and they will tell you why they choose not pick you and there is no second chance for an interview. I called and the told me I was denied.

None of your links work the way they are supposed to. I cannot create a password or change one because the link to change it send me right back to the download page. We should be able to just sign up and create a password at that point. This is kind of goofy the way its set up.

If I could give it 0 stars I would. I tried signing up with google and facebook and it wouldn't let. I then tried with email i put in most info and at the end it said there was an error and I'd have to try again later. Either fix the app or take it down already

title: YouTube
description:
Get the official YouTube app for Android phones and tablets. See what the world is watching -- from the hottest music videos to what‚Äôs trending in gaming, entertainment, news, and more. Subscribe to channels you love, share with friends, and watch on any device.

With a new design, you can have fun exploring videos you love more easily and quickly than before. Just tap an icon or swipe to switch between recommended videos, your subscriptions, or your account. You can also subscribe to your favorite channels, create playlists, edit and upload videos, express yourself with comments or shares, cast a video to your TV, and more ‚Äì all from inside the app.

FIND VIDEOS YOU LOVE FAST

‚Ä¢ Browse personal recommendations on the Home tab

‚Ä¢ See the latest from your favorite channels on the Subscriptions tab

‚Ä¢ Look up videos you‚Äôve watched and liked on the Account tab

CONNECT AND SHARE

‚Ä¢ Let people know how you feel with likes, comments, and shares

‚Ä¢ Upload and edit your own videos with filters and music ‚Äì all inside the app
descriptionHTML:
Get the official YouTube app for Android phones and tablets. See what the world is watching -- from the hottest music videos to what‚Äôs trending in gaming, entertainment, news, and more. Subscribe to channels you love, share with friends, and watch on any device.

With a new design, you can have fun exploring videos you love more easily and quickly than before. Just tap an icon or swipe to switch between recommended videos, your subscriptions, or your account. You can also subscribe to your favorite channels, create playlists, edit and upload videos, express yourself with comments or shares, cast a video to your TV, and more ‚Äì all from inside the app.

FIND VIDEOS YOU LOVE FAST

‚Ä¢ Browse personal recommendations on the Home tab

summary: Enjoy your favorite videos and channels with the official YouTube app.
recentChanges: For new features, look for in-product education & notifications sharing the feature and how to use it!
comments: It's YouTube, but in an app. So that works The "cast to TV" function is very useful but so awfully placed that I often accidentally tap it while trying to adjust settings like video quality or subtitles. Also. There is this particularly annoying bug when I try to scroll downwards. Where it just forces me back to the top of the page. There's no way around it (eg scrolling slowly). Very frustrating. It keeps recurring every few months or so. I assumed it was fixed but it started up again today.

Every time I run a video on the app, it takes 20 minutes for the video to stop and none of other videos are opening, I then need to wait for 15-20 mins to reopen the app and play the video again( ps: internet on wifi is running regular meanwhile, I can save the video but I can't watch it directly from your app)

The overlay screen will remain over the video until I hit the X. Up until recently, it would not come up until I hit a blank area of the screen to bring up the screen to pause the video. Once I would hit play, the screen would disappear. Now it comes up over every video and I have to hit the X every time, in order to get rid of it and there's no timout. Very annoying.

I get the whole digital marketing stuff but it's getting too annoying. First of all, not all ads should be displayed. Secondly, you recommend videos based on what the person usually views right? So let the ads coming be in that circle. I don't have to be listening to a gospel music and I'm cut by strip club advertüòí or something way out of league. Finally, please stop disrupting videos in the middle to play ad. It can come before or after but not the middle. And don't make the ads long. Thanks.

Why the pause?! Ok so I get that I can access great content for free. They're bound to introduce more adverts as soon as they bring out a premium version. However, about once every 10 minutes my video will pause, and I have to press play to continue watching (screen says "Thanks for confirming.") which is incredibly annoying as I'm a baker all day and I use these videos for entertainment or tutorials and often don't have hands free to touch the screen. Remove this and I'd add another star :(

title: Google Chrome: Fast & Secure
description:
Google Chrome is a fast, easy to use, and secure web browser. Designed for Android, Chrome brings you personalized news articles, quick links to your favorite sites, downloads, and Google Search and Google Translate built-in. Download now to enjoy the same Chrome web browser experience you love across all your devices.
        
        Browse fast and type less. Choose from personalized search results that instantly appear as you type and quickly browse previously visited web pages. Fill in forms quickly with Autofill.
        
        Incognito Browsing. Use Incognito mode to browse the internet without saving your history. Browse privately across all your devices.
        
        Sync Chrome Across Devices. When you sign into Chrome, your bookmarks, passwords, and settings will be automatically synced across all your devices. You can seamlessly access all your information from your phone, tablet, or laptop.
        
        All your favorite content, one tap away. Chrome is not just fast for Google Search, but designed so you are one tap away from all your favorite content. You can tap on your favorite news sites or social media directly from the new tab page. Chrome also has the ‚ÄúTap to Search‚Äù- feature on most webpages. You can tap on any word or phrase to start a Google search while still in the page you are enjoying.
        
        Protect your phone with Google Safe Browsing. Chrome has Google Safe Browsing built-in. It keeps your phone safe by showing warnings to you when you attempt to navigate to dangerous sites or download dangerous files.
        
        Fast downloads and view web pages and videos offline Chrome has a dedicated download button, so you can easily download videos, pictures, and entire webpages with just one tap. Chrome also has downloads home right inside Chrome, where you can access all the content you downloaded, even when you are offline.
        
        Google Voice Search. Chrome gives you an actual web browser you can talk to. Use your voice to find answers on-the-go without typing and go hands free. You can browse and navigate quicker using your voice anywhere, anytime.
        
        Google Translate built-in: Quickly translate entire web pages. Chrome has Google Translate built in to help you to translate entire web to your own language with one tap.
        
        Use less mobile data and speed up the web. Turn on Lite mode and use up to 60% less data. Chrome can compress text, images, videos, and websites without lowering the quality.
        
        Smart personalized recommendations. Chrome creates an experience that is tailored to your interests.  On the new tab page, you will find articles that Chrome selected based on your previous browsing history.
