recentChanges:
Thanks for choosing Chrome! This release contains the following features, as well as stability and performance improvements:

‚Ä¢ Quieter notifications: You can see fewer notification requests with a new permission option.
‚Ä¢ SameSite cookies: By default, cookies are treated as same-site only.
‚Ä¢ Secure media: Insecure audio and video on secure pages are automatically upgraded to secure connections.
comments: The older versions were simple and easy to use. But, there are things I don't like in this new update. 1. Some gesture controls have been changed. 2. The TABS IN GROUP style seems to be very complex and it is hard to getting used to. 3. Switching between two tabs is not easy like before. So I would be happy if the older layouts are used in the future updates.

I've used this app extensively for years, and I've loved it. Recently, though, they've made a change get in the way you search for images. Once you search by image, and tap, "View more sizes," the following view no longer displays the dimensions for the images. It was a nice touch and one that I really enjoyed, when looking for wallpapers, but now that it's gone, I don't think I'm going to be using this app, anymore.

You need to fix your App. Been getting a lot of error messages for the past month. Apps are often unresponsive and won't open. Not having any of these issues on other Google sponsored browsers like Opera, and none on Bing. Prefer Chrome, but until you get these issues solved I'm switching over to something else. Note I have cleared the cache and data at least 3 or 4 times.

This app is an absolute slap in the face to the user. At a time when MOST people use their mobile phones for everything, this app snatches away all the functionality of the desktop version. There's no easy way to duplicate a tab or close "all" or "other" tabs just by pressing on the tabs themselves. There is no way to save favorites on the homepage. No quick way to get to bookmarks. And worst of all, no option to have all sites open in desktop by default. Horrible user experience. Disaster!

My chrome has also not been working since the last update, won't open or load any page. Have already uninstalled, reinstalled, cleared data, and followed all the troubleshooting instructions in the support pages. These are not a solution! Please help. I have already checked I'm connected to the internet and have already checked out your community answers, they do not solve the problem. Please don't reply with an unhelpful automated response!

title: Fitness at Home by GetFit - No-Equipment Workout
description:
Our personalized home workout for women and workout for men are designed to help you lose weight or gain weight, lose belly fat and build muscle, keep fitness at home with no equipment at all! 

Fitness at Home by GetFit will provide you with fitness exercises for your abs and core, legs and arms, chest and buttocks ‚Äì you will get the full body workout at home. Tone muscles, burn calories, lose weight and get a body of your dream in a short time!

Features:
- Personalized programs. Achieve your goals through short personalized daily bodyweight workouts designed by certified GetFit fitness trainers and tailored to you. Just decide on your fitness goal: lose weight or gain weight, get fit or sculpt your body, the app will develop a special workout plan for you. Make your bodyweight training effective with our muscle building workout! 

- No equipment workout for everyone. In the app you will find workout for women, beginner workout, workout for men, abs workout, HIIT workout, buttocks workout, 7 minute workout and many more. Try to build muscle or lose belly fat right now!

- GetFit masterclass programs. Looking for a proven workout? Join one of 4 Masterclass programs designed and used by the GetFit certified coaches: Fat Destroyer, Power & Strength, Post-Pregnancy, and Bikini-Ready.

- Detailed videos and tutorials. Voice and video instructions will guide you through each session. Lose weight with your personal trainer!

- 7 minute workout. No more struggling to fit workout into your busy schedule ‚Äì all you need is 7 minute workout a day! With this home 7 minute workout, you‚Äôll get the most out of your time without any special equipment. Lose weight, tone and sculpt your muscles easily!

- Exercises for any goal with no equipment. Push ups and plank for six pack abs, squats, sit ups for buttocks, crunch for the full body workout! Take a squat challenge, abs or plank challenge and burn calories in a way you never knew you could!

- Support and inspiration. Expand your knowledge, sharpen your mind, and share your thoughts on fitness, nutrition, and mindset on our Blog.

Get the best workout plan designed to help you lose weight,  sculpt tempting curves and  tone your buttocks! Try and see the progress after the first day!

recentChanges:
Thanks for using Fitness Workout by GetFit! We update the app as often as possible to make your fitness workout experience better than ever.

Here is what you will find in our latest update:
- Performance and stability improvements

Love the app? Rate us and let us know what you think about the improvements at support@getfitapps.com.
comments: My number one question is: why? Since when do you have to pay for a fitness app? Things like this should be free, and you should have the option to subscribe, not be held against your will to do so. If the app is set for 30 days, how am I supposed to do the entire workout in three days? Fitness apps should not be 'purchased', they should be free, with the option to subscribe. If I asked (numerous) people around me, I'm sure they would agree. This app is not worth the download or your time. üëé

SCAM! - 3 day trial is ridiculously short and after trying to find out how to cancel make sure I wasn't auto subscribed at the end of 3 days I couldn't find it. Apps developer literally copy pasted the same response for every problem even when people are saying support isn't getting back to them the response on here is to email support. Couldn't even see the first days exercise before signing up for the trial which automatically goes into a subscription. SCAM.

Update- thought it was glitch on first day of tracking but 2nd day is same thing Be aware this does not work. 3-22-2020. Just installed and paid for 6 months. Completed initial setup until I click on intro workout. It then just keeps clocking.3-21-2020

BEWARE THIS IS A SCAM!! After paying the premium monthly wage the app never opened and all the features are inaccessible, it kept crashing and crashing. Deleting and downloading again only offers the possibility to subscribe again and nothing works until you pay again. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP, THEY JUST STEAL YOUR MONEY

I want to cancel but cannot find away to do it! I got a 3 day trial period. Thought I would be interested in this app and only way I could see it is if I signed up and paid for it I'd tried it for 3 days free. I'm not going to try it, I'm not interested and it seems as they will make me pay at least one week before I can cancel! It's a scam to get you for some money, somehow! Found a way to cancel, you can't do it from the app, you need to go back to the page you downloaded it from.

title: Facemoji Emoji Keyboard:DIY,Emoji,Keyboard Theme
description:

comments: Okay, I'm IN LOVE with this app but one thing that's really getting on my nerves is that it keeps merging my words together when I'm writing something. It's starting to become a hassle because I'll go on and do a hole sentence and I'd have to restart the entire sentence over two or three times. Please fix this!

It's amazing but the only issue for me is that I can't make names for my personalized keyboards long at all, it says I can only make it 20 characters long but sometimes it only let's me do 17 or 16 characters. So I don't really think this is a issue for everyone one but I really want to be able to name my keyboards with longer names please.

I really like this game because it have many function. I can add piano music. I make my face keyboard, GFriend keyboard, BTS keyboard and other. Good for all. I can add many shape like ‚ù§ and other of the themes. I did'nt lie.

Keeps deleting every sticker, theme and emoji right after I download it really frustrating might have to uninstall until fixed. Other than that was cool. I also don't know how to access certain features.

It's great! But just one thing is that when I'm trying to type codes and stuff doe things it's annoying bcoz it keeps having spaces after the full stop or exclamation mark. But all in all its amazing! .. This is an edit. So a few days ago I posted the review and stated my problems. I'm glad to find out that the developers actually read these. And they helped me out in solving the problem. Sooo that's a five star from me! Soo defonetly download this! It's an amazing app!

title: GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating
description:
If you don't want to get lost, please download our GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating application. GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating is an Android application to helps you Navigate base on Google Maps API. Actually GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating has more advanced and unique features such as GPS Navigation, Transits, Live Maps, Street View, Digital Compass with different map layer like Satellite, Hybrid, Terrain

GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating help you to calculate best traffic free routes and time to travel to the destination on maps. Simply by selecting two location on the Map the app GPS, Maps, Navigations & Driving Directions will calculate driving directions to that location by simply selecting two location on live map.

Main Features:

- Map Navigate
- Address Finder
- Nearby Places
- Streetview Map
- Traffic Finder
- Compass Mode
- GPS Tracker
- Area Caculating
- Speedometer

Disclaimer: GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating will never upload any of user personal data and developed only for information purpose.

title: Truebill Budget Planner, Bill Tracker and Reminder
description:
TRACK EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Truebill, the most convenient and big picture personal finance tracker, budget planner and bill reminder app.

Bill tracker app, Truebill‚Äôs user friendly interface lets you seamlessly track everything from expenses & spending to upcoming bills  - all while putting money back into your pocket! The budget planner and bill reminder keep track so you don‚Äôt have to.  

OVER A MILLION USERS TRUST TRUEBILL?
‚óâ NBC: This Startup Is Helping People Find Forgotten Money

‚óâ CNN: How To Shave Hundreds Off Your Credit Card Bill

‚óâ Fortune: There‚Äôs Now A Startup To Help You Cancel All Those Subscriptions

‚óâ TechCrunch: Truebill Wants To Help You Manage Your Online Subscriptions

‚óâ Chicago Tribune: 15-Minute Fixes For Your Family‚Äôs Finances

THE BUDGET PLANNER AND BILL REMINDER
Truebill, a budget planner and bill reminder app, evaluates your financial standing holistically, giving you a personal finance tracker & bill tracker app that balances automation and customization to make money saving as easy as possible.

Truebill is free to use and offers a wide array of tools all on one simple platform. Save money by managing your subscriptions and bills. Truebill, monthly bill organizer, will automatically detect and manage subscriptions, helping you to keep track of everything --even the ones you may have forgotten about! 

Truebill is a budget planner and bill reminder you can trust!

 THE BILL TRACKER THAT ACTUALLY HELPS YOU SAVE MONEY
Log-in to easily view your monthly bill organizer to stay on top of subscriptions, enjoy easy cancellation and bill negotiations handled by Truebill on your behalf. Having a personal finance tracker in your pocket to manage bills will put an end to late fees and overdraft charges.

Join the thousands using Truebill, expense tracker & spending tracker app to feel confident and in control of your finances. Users see savings of $512 per year by using the budget planner to track spending, manage subscriptions & lower bills. You can even receive credits for things like internet outages - automatically by using this simple expense tracker and spending tracker app.

Examples of how Truebill will save money automatically:

‚úì Negotiating the best rates on cable, internet, and cell phone bills
‚úì Getting you credits for service outages you may not even know about
‚úì Manage subscriptions, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and keep track of recurring bills
‚úì Track and manage bills with our monthly bill organizer
‚úì Get bank fees refunded, automatically

 MANAGE BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS TOGETHER
Bill tracker app, Truebill, is easy to use and your next step towards taking back time and money lost on managing subscriptions, tracking expenses, spending, and budget planning. Truebill expense tracker is your free personal financial tracker and the only app designed to put money back into your pocket.

Truebill is an intuitive monthly bill organizer & bill tracker app created to save money automatically. Our proactive spending tracker & expense tracker tool highlights trends and subscriptions, keeping you in the loop with alerts from the budget planner.

Download our amazing spending tracker &  bill tracker app today and enjoy the best personal finance tracker in the play store!

By downloading and using Truebill, you agree to our current Terms of Use (truebill.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (truebill.com/privacy).

recentChanges: We've added a bills toggle to your spending tab so you can see your spending pie chart without bills (which often eat up too much of the pie!). We've also fixed some bugs.
comments: Amazing! This app helps me better my spending habit with little to no effort. Its not amazing at automatically categorizing your purchases but pretty good. The app automatically sets a budget for each category on an average of your spending for that category but you can lower or raise them if u want. It will notify u when your getting close to your budget limit. Splendid!
Excellent app. Helps to show how I can save more and renegotiates bills with companies like cable to lower your bill. So you don't have to renegotiate it yourself.
For someone using this app for about 2 weeks now, I think this is amazing to see were your money is going the most which can help you plan better and save more. Great job Truebill
Failure to receive code. Despite many attempts to receive the message that's supposed to be sent to my number, none have succeeded. I assure that the correct information is being put in.
Having the same issue as others have posted before. Oneplus 7 pro. Formatting issues. Text cut off. Words missing. Letters cut off.

title: Samsung Email
description:
This update is available for Samsung Mobile with Android OS.

Samsung Email enables users to manage multiple personal and business email accounts seamlessly.¬†Samsung Email also offers EAS integration for business, encryption using S/MIME to safeguard data and ease-of-use features such as insightful notifications, SPAM management.¬†Furthermore, organizations can administer various policies as needed.¬† 
¬†
Precautions
. Doesn't support SamsungTheme from P OS

Key features
¬∑¬†POP3 and IMAP support for managing personal email accounts 
¬∑ Exchange ActiveSync (EAS) integration for synchronizing Exchange Server based business email, calendars, contacts and tasks
¬∑¬†Encryption using S/MIME for secure email communication

Additional features
¬∑¬†Customizable user experience with notifications, schedule synchronization, SPAM management, and combined mailboxes
¬∑¬†Policy administration with comprehensive, built-in EAS support
¬∑¬†Conversation and thread view to read related mail


--- Regarding the App Access Permission ---

The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

[Required permissions]
   - None 

[Optional permissions]
   - Camera: Used to attach photos to email
   - Location: Used to attach current location information to email
   - Contacts: Used to link email recipients/senders with contacts and synchronize contact information when using Microsoft Exchange account
   - Storage: Used to attach files to email or save attached files
   - Phone: Used to check device-unique identification information when using Microsoft Exchange account.

comments: This app does not display properly in landscape mode on Samsung galaxy a40. You just get a screen saying "Select an email from the list". However it does not display a list of emails. Turn it back to portrait and it is fine. Come on Samsung, if you're  going to load an app onto your own devices that can't be removed at least make sure it works correctly.

I am a big fan of Samsung software but this one app has a glitch. When I get an email, it says I have two emails. When I have 2 emails, it says I have three. This makes it impossible to view email previews in the notification page. It seems to only do that with Google mail. So I am forced to use the Google mail app for Gmail and for everything else I use Daum or Samsung mail. If this glitch did not occur, I would be very satisfied with Samsung mail

I'm not sure why this changed recently, but please make swipe actions (move, delete, etc. by swiping from email list) only applicable to the latest email in that thread/chain/conversation. I've noticed now its affecting the all the emails of that thread in the same folder unless you open the email directly. Or, at least provide a setting so user can choose preference.

UPDATE: 3.5 STAR. It works exactly like the Gmail app except better. It shows you all the messages from your multiple accounts in one section, and a delete all function when deleting multiple messages. Things I do not like about it is how they show this HUGE banners on top of the screen as part of OneUI, and it keep my Google accounts signed in on my Samsung internet browser.

Nothing is perfect, however there is appeal in simplicity. The app does what I need it to. Allows me to select what should be filtered out and what I would want as "top priority". I like that I can have multiple e-mails signed in as well. If I could complain about anything, is that I should be able to change my adolescent email addresses. That's on me though so.. Lol. Good app!

title: Flipgrid
description:
Flipgrid is the leading video discussion platform used by millions of PreK to PhD students, educators, and families around the world. Flipgrid brings the back row to the front and helps learners of all ages find their voices, share their voices, and respect the diverse voices of others. 

Teachers spark discussion by posting topics and questions to a class, school, professional learning community, or the world. Students record, upload, view, react, and respond to each other‚Äôs short videos. 

Flipgrid students build and strengthen social learning communities as they discuss their ideas and experiences with their peers.
Flipgrid amplifies student voice and supports student development of global empathy as they immerse themselves in each other‚Äôs learning processes and perspectives. That‚Äôs what it‚Äôs all about! 

Need help? Contact our awesome support team: support@flipgrid.com.

üéâ Flipgrid is simple. üöÄ Engage and empower every voice in your classroom or community by recording and sharing short, awesome videos! Your community doesn't need to be together to learn together! ü•≥

Reach out to us and the amazing Flipgrid community on Twitter by tagging @Flipgrid or #FlipgridFever!

comments: Extremely difficult to use. I mean it's a great idea to sort out lessons and response, however the execution is terrible. I can't find my response to the teacher due to moderation, but I don't even know if my response is submitted. The sorting is difficult to find and my fellow students often mistake one lesson to another due to bad design.

Flipgrid is such a robust app for amplifying student voice! They keep improving this amazing free app and it just gets better and better. The disco library allows for teacher collaboration, shorts are fun ,and GridPals allow global connection. The fact that students can now splice various video clips together from the whiteboard feature, the flipping camera feature, the pull from camera roll feature added so much functionality. The Mixtapes make it possible to share highlights or compilations.

I started using this app two days ago, and I already love it. It helps engage my students with each other on a face-to-face level. I also appreciate the security levels. One recommendation: I think teachers should have the option of approving videos before they are posted (like in Padlet). Thanks for this app during this Coronavirus school closing!

We love the FlipGrid app! It is really easy to use! My students can reflect on questions that they may be apprehensive to answer in front of their peers. We use it to practice languages but also for the fun to do a a big search around the school! Flipgrid is constantly doing updates and adding new features to keep the Flipgrid improving! Flipgrid brings the student voice in to the classroom!!

Love getting to hear my students' reflections and that they can respond at home or in school - so they have more time to process prompts and how they want to respond. It's especially nice now that we are going distance learning because we are staying connected!

comments: Couldn't speak more highly of this program. The content & material it provides is undeniably the best on the market, while being fun & engaging. I've never had any technical difficulties. I bought the full personal package a couple years ago & recently recieved a free upgrade to access all languages! It was already more than worth the purchase so I am very grateful. If you actually want to start learning a language or brush up on your skills you won't regret the purchase!

When I tried to do spanish it kept telling me I was doing it wrong. I personally took spanish classes and was looking for more help. I don't think this app is really good with its audio. When I try to speak into the audio its always says "Please move to a quiet place and speak slower". I usually speak fast so uhhh don't know what to do then.

I also had the message "SOMETHING HAS GONE WRONG" but after trying many things all I did was delete the app. Shut off my tablet. Waited 2 mins and turned it back on to reinstall and that solved the problem. Hopefully this helps others. The App version is actually very easy to use and learn. I'm satisfied.

Very happy to have all languages available and grateful that they updated my purchase with it without me having to do anything. App is fun and easy to use and it checks for the accent which is the main thing. Excited to learn French and later Tagalog, Italian, Hebrew, and all the other languages I've been wanting to learn!

I haven't used it much, but this is clearly not the typical language learning app I'm used to. I finished the first core lesson and didn't hear or see a single word in English, but I'm definitely more confident in what I've learned here than anywhere else. It's interesting, and in the best way. I can't wait to keep learning. :)

recentChanges: Thanks for using the 21-Day Meditation Experience App! We regularly release updates to the app store. Get the newest features and bug fixes by updating to the latest version. Happy meditating!
comments: Great app that gets more intuitive with each update... The free program is always a pleasure and when you think about it, compared to everything else one might do for their mental (and physical) health, the pricing for the expanded programs is pretty fair. I definitely recommend this to all of my friends and family and to anyone reading this. What have you got to lose?

I've been trying to sign up, to start with a meditation challenge and the app doesn't send me the activation email. When I try resending it doesn't work, when I try to click on the help center I also get an error message. I've been trying since yesterday, and nothing seems to work, like a cursed loop. Can someone help me with this, please?

Recent update resulted in my inability to listen to the meditations continuously on my android device. The meditation cuts off every few minutes requiring me to restart it in the app. I have more than one meditation program I have tested this on.

It is unfortunate that the recent updates have disabled many of the functionalities in the "Free" experience that are available in the paid version such as being able to listen to the meditation while reading the text or journaling. Shouldn't new users also have the opportunity to appreciate the full experience? After all, it is only for a limited time. Just sayin'... Thanks for listening...
I am so thrilled that I used the app to meditate if only for the last day. This is my first time using the app. I was very apprehensive initially, thought it would be difficult. Could be age related!

title: Calculator
description:
Calculator provides simple and advanced mathematical functions in a beautifully designed app.

‚Ä¢ Perform basic calculations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
‚Ä¢ Do scientific operations such as trigonometric, logarithmic, and exponential functions
descriptionHTML:
Calculator provides simple and advanced mathematical functions in a beautifully designed app.

‚Ä¢ Perform basic calculations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division
‚Ä¢ Do scientific operations such as trigonometric, logarithmic, and exponential functions
summary: A simple calculator utility for Android
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Calculator now displays decimal results and symbolic results for fractions or certain advanced functions. For example, 10 √∑ 12 will display both 0.83333‚Ä¶ and ‚Öö.
comments: Good but not Great Calculator because missing some important useful features is- 1. Currency calculation 2. Volume calculation 3. Length calculation 4. Weight and Mass calculation 5. Temperature calculation 6. Energy calculation 7. Area calculation 8. Speed calculation 9. Time calculation 10. Power calculation 11. Data calculation 12. Pressure calculation 13. Angle calculation Freatures. I request you plz add these useful freature for smarter Google Calculator.

After a big update on my phone, I noticed my calculator app was missing. So I had to reinstall. And it is now so much different than it was before. It's so cluttered by extras and I really don't like it. Why not give the option to turn all the extra features off and on? I don't need all that, I just need a basic calculator. And what happened to the clear button?

It was ok until the system update. The format changed, now has answer on top in decimal and wierd fractions, big bar of signs i don't need in the middle, and smaller numbers on the bottom for doing calculations. If i have to do the system update for security, why does the format for simple apps like this have to change? Why?? Installed a more user-friendly calculator app and moved this to a folder of pre-installed apps that i don't use.

UI looks weird in Oneplus 5t. Scientific calculator options stacked above number pad makes the UI look weird and complicated. Backspace and equals button arranged in second column aquires space that could be used to make the number pad bigger and spacious. UI should look similar to the sample image provided in Play Store

Silly, doesn't behave like you would from an ordinary desktop calculator, for instance requiring Polish notation for square roots (root symbol first, that is, like you would write it on paper, rather than how you would enter it on a regular calculator, i.e. number, then operator). The features are also very limited. Where is base conversion, for instance? Surprising to see you can get such a seemingly simple app wrong.

title: IMVU - Create 3D Avatar and make real friends
description:
IMVU is a 3D avatar-based social experience with the largest 3D world and catalog to customize your look and meet new people. Chat with friends, roleplay and join a virtual world with millions of others for free!

IMVU is a virtual world simulator game and social chat. More than a life simulation, it‚Äôs a virtual life unto itself, where you can enter a 3D world with your avatar and choose your life as you want it to be.

Customize a 3D avatar, personalize your own animated emoji and message friends! Your dream life, love life and virtual life await in IMVU!

AVATAR CREATION
- Choose your life and customize yourself.
- 3D avatar creator lets you design yourself from top to bottom.
- Role play your virtual life however you desire - get weird, get wild, it‚Äôs all you!
- Avatar looks can change to match your style - shop without limits!

CHAT IN 3D
- Chat with friends from all over the world!
- Chat lobby lets you connect with players near and far.
- Avatar chat gives you full conversations that are more than instant messages.

EXPRESS YOURSELF, AS YOURSELF
- Chat with friends using your personal animated WithMoji.
- Online social game for you and your friends to enjoy.

YOUR VIRTUAL LIFE
- The avatar life is your life, make it what you want it to be!
- Want a love story? IMVU can be a dating simulator for your avatar‚Äôs love life.
- Role play and chat with friends to create an amazing story.

GET SOCIAL AND SHARE YOUR #MOOD

- Virtual chat with a range of emotes, emoji and functions

I love the game, don't get me wrong but I'm about to uninstall tge app if it keeps happening over and over. It has happend 7 times now.

title: Microsoft Word: Write, Edit & Share Docs on the Go
description:
Read and edit documents attached to emails, collaborate with your team and bring the Microsoft Office features wherever you go with Microsoft Word. The Word app from Microsoft lets you create, read, edit, and share your files quickly and easily.

Word introduces a mobile PDF reader for your phone. Edit documents and read PDFs or e-books while traveling, before bedtime, or wherever you want.

Create documents, blogs, write-ups, or resumes on the go. Write letters, resumes, documents, or notes your way with robust tools that enable you to write with the best format options.

The writing app and word processor is as handy as you want it to be, whether you‚Äôre a blogger, writer, journalist, columnist, student, or a project manager working on documentation. Your office moves with you when you use Microsoft Word.

Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team wherever you are with Microsoft Word.

Microsoft Word Features:

Create Documents With Confidence
‚Ä¢ Create docs, assignments, letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes and more with beautifully designed modern templates.
‚Ä¢ Editing with rich formatting and layout.
‚Ä¢ Document editor keeps formats and layouts pristine and looking great.
‚Ä¢ Docs app with templates for resumes, forms and more.

Read, Write, and Edit
‚Ä¢ Read docs, letters, PDFs, scripts, and more on your device with Reading View.
‚Ä¢ Edit documents from PDFs by converting to and from Word documents.
‚Ä¢ PDF file conversion: save as PDF after editing and share your PDF file with a few taps.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
‚Ä¢ Project managers can collaborate by commenting in your doc right next to the text.
‚Ä¢ Read & edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout, and formatting.
‚Ä¢ Editor version history lets you revert to view earlier drafts.

Sharing is simplified
‚Ä¢ Share files and collaborate with a few taps.
‚Ä¢ File & doc permission management that lets you see who is working on them.
‚Ä¢ Copy Microsoft Word files directly into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach your PDFs and docs to an email.

Microsoft Office 365
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office 365 users can access premium features:
‚Ä¢ Editing tracks and reviews changes.
‚Ä¢ Format with page orientation, columns, custom headers and footers.
‚Ä¢ Edit charts and modify chart elements.

Download Microsoft Word now and edit documents anywhere.


REQUIREMENTS

OS version: running any of the supported versions of Android and have an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor. Support for Kitkat & Lollipop devices will continue till June 2019
ÔøΩ 1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.
Unlock the full Microsoft Office experience with a qualifying Office 365 subscription (see http://aka.ms/Office365subscriptions) for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Office 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.
This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula

comments: I hate to complain, because it might just be the best Word Processing app out there. But, there are innumerable problems with the interface - especially manipulating/dragging the cursor for editing. Also there are periodic discrepancies in template formatting, indentions, margins and paragraph spacing. All in all though, it gets the job done. And, as I said, it probably is the best mobile word processor out there. I'm sure that with time and updating the devs will get all of that fixed.

Wonderful!!! It's more than wonderful this software has been a dream of mine for over twenty years I was first using Microsoft 98 word and word weaver. I think that was the name of the product that I had used. in my office supply and tool store. It was a really a good product back then. It really promoted my thoughts and ideas into a reality. Thank You. Office 365 is where it's at " a good product "

This app seems to do most of what a desktop version of Word does. The trick is to figuring out what all of the little icons mean to do what you need to do. For example, you can convert a table to text, but it took me a while to figure out that there was a conversion *arrow* that looks similar to a "back" arrow (or *undo* arrow) that was actually the convert icon. I don't know if that example made sense, but the point is that you can do a lot with this if you're willing to figure it out.

The interface is very janky and has numerous problems of which I cannot name from the top of my head right now. Despite this it "gets the job done" but despite this for simple editing such as moving images/shapes and paragraph spacing and intergers tend to be very janky. But I haven't had it for long but these are my first impressions on mobile.

Not full-fledged like the Windows version, but good for the Android platform, well tailored to touch-screen interaction and a works well with mouse and keyboard on a tablet. You'll miss some features and sometimes find that annoying, but overall, it's probably the best word processing app you can get for your phone or tablet.

title: SmartNews: Local Breaking News
description:
SmartNews is the award-winning news app downloaded by 40+ million readers in 100+ countries!

SmartNews analyzes millions of articles every day to deliver the top trending news stories influencing the world right now.

SmartNews delivers high-quality news headlines and breaking news from top news publishers: NBC News, MSNBC, USA Today, TIME, The Huffington Post, Bleacher Report, Quartz, The Verge, VICE, VOX, AP, Reuters, Buzzfeed, Fast Company and more.

***

- CNET

- General improvements to make sure we provide the news that matters to you.
- Introducing our Coronavirus channel! Follow local updates and the latest news to stay healthy and informed!

comments: This app came with my new LG, and at 1st didn't know what to make of it (as per getting used to any new ph ü§£). Still, I now have all breaking news (at the moment), and other news coming to me at specific times (changeable), so is what I now rely on as my only source for news. It is geo-programmed for local news, as that's what I'm receiving. As well as world news, and sports. All conveniently tagged at the top of the page, and coming as SMS messages üòâ I LOVE IT !! üíØ‚òù

This app is very useful for news from all sides and has a very organized layout. There is even an option to read a more HTML version of stories if you have slow internet, or you can read them straight from the web. One thing, however, and something that cant really be changed, is that it's the source of my anxiety regarding coronavirus.

Could be a cool way to get news. But most the bloggers here always repeat what they stated several times to make it seem longer and wastes more time than need be. Bloggers constantly use slang, misspelled word, and some articles seem to be made up bull with a caption and picture (that dont even match half the time) that are just to lure in more clicks. Some news is ok maybe even most but sll tge other things make it very hard to follow along and want to keep reading, like didn't finish eng1!

I really like smart news with one exception: news items are let on the site too long. I can see native 2 days running however when I see articles beyond that I can't get but wonder if they're being used as filler material? Just wondering. I can even handle the repetitive ads as they're easy to skip. All in all I like how you provide the news. I read every day. Thank you very much.

Great updated news in a person's area or whereever they choose for their location is to get their news from.Luv thee app. It's very easy to use. Luv the great info. that it give's me everyday.Thanks to all who helped in creating this great app. I really love getting daily updaate's on what's going on in thee area that's surrounding me and where I live,too.Thank's for thee great info. and everything else that I get with it,too.It helps me to be safe!‚úãüòÄüåàüåà

title: Google Drive
description:
Google Drive is a safe place for all your files and puts them within reach from any smartphone, tablet, or computer. Files in Drive ‚Äì like your videos, photos, and documents ‚Äì are backed up safely so you can‚Äôt lose them. Once there, you can easily invite others to view, edit, or leave comments on any of your files or folders.

With Drive, you can:

- Safely store your files and access them from anywhere.
- Search for files by name and content.
- Easily share files and folders with others.
- Quickly view your content.
- Set access levels for who can view, comment, or edit.
- Quickly access recent files.
- See file details and activity.
- Enable viewing of files offline.
- Use your device camera to scan in paper documents.
- Access pictures and videos from Google Photos.

summary: Free online storage from Google.
recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Last few days, I've had issues uploading to my folders. As an artist, I save references all the time, and Drive was my go-to. But whenever I've tried to upload to my folders, it's stuck with "Waiting to upload." Then it appears to upload, then goes back to "Waiting to upload" again. I've tried to clear the cache, I've tried reaching out on Twitter a couple of time, and sent quite a few feedback reports, and nothing has been fixed, nor have I heard back from anyone. I just want my Drive fixed.

I cannot access the files that I made available offline easily. They can't be managed by other apps. Folders cannot be downloaded to be used by other apps (files can be). Audio player tries not to be an audio player. Has no advantage over the other suite apps like Sheets. In other words I need to play audio files in order, but it doesn't do it well and doesn't let other apps do it. I don't want to download everything just because I might need them. So yeah, this app is a joke that is not funny

I loved the app, until the problem appeared. I lost the comments on the pdf files. I think those were saved offline on my phone, and when they synchronized with the drive instead of sending comments to drive it seemed that they were overwritten by a file with no comments in it. So now comments are lost. Also, I couldn't add screenshots of the problem in the feedback tool, as you have only the option to add screenshot of the place from where you opened the feedback tool (a bit strange)

Really love Google Drive. Keeps photos in touch whenever I accidentally delete them in my actual Gallery. I always take screenshots so it's really nice that I have separate folders for separate years because it's very organized just the way I like it. This isn't the only app I use to keep photos but it does get the job done and it makes me happy. It's not difficult to share or download whatever is in my drive unless you aren't a geeky kind of gal like me then I don't know how others use this.üòÖ

I think it's a good app it's pretty simple to use but I am having issues. I try to get rid of photos and folders and so i put them in the trash then i delete the trash; but when i find more things to get rid of and go to the trash all of my stuff is still there and now theres so much i have to buy storage even though i continuously try to get rid of the trash. Please help.

title: Android System WebView
description: Android WebView is a system component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. This component is pre-installed on your device and should be kept up to date to ensure you have the latest security updates and other bug fixes.

comments: If this was preinstalled why is it under an account that I added after setting up my phone??? Why are you using mobile data when I have turned all applications off and recheck every couple months and NEVER SAW THIS APP SINCE GETTING MY PHONE A YEAR AND A HALF AGO??? But you are telling me I cannot uninstall??? I am getting sick of Google putting things THAT I DO NOT WANT on MY phone!! If I need the app I'LL LOOK FOR THE ONE I WANT..DIDNT NEED IT 3 MONTHS AGO..DONT TELL ME IT WAS PREINSTALLED

I really hope that "Android System Webview"..."powered by Chrome", means that in addition to Google, Android and Chrome will get a look at How everything is performing, and How Much one's devices and network are being interfered with, by unscrupulous imposters who intercept one's 'internet connection' through an illegal, warrantless coaxial cable splice hardline telephone line wiretap. Hoping that the more techs become aware of mistreatment & malfeasance, the better chance something'll be done!

Web content for apps, powered by Chrome Android WebView is a system component powered by Chrome that allows Android apps to display web content. This component is pre-installed on your device and should be kept up to date to be sure that you have the latest security updates and other bug fixes.

Wow. An awesome app. It even auto updates without wifi or data connection. I think it uses radio waves. On top of that, my life runs 4 times faster than before. And I get no more depression and my terminal cancer disappeared right after the update. After the update my wife instantly fell pregnant, even though she had hysterectomy. Google is outright amazing and such a blessing to the world. I look forward to the next update eagerly.

What is going on with all your apps Google, this app and others are slow to download or not downloading at all and it's causing other apps to go slow. It's happening on WiFi & 4G in different locations so not Internet related, all trouble shooting done like resetting apps, clear data/catches etc etc. Everything been done to remedy it. It's happening on various devices, 4 of ours (2 phones & 2 tablets) on different android versions so not device related. This is on your end

title: Google Play Music
description:
Google Play Music provides free, ad-supported radio for what you‚Äôre doing, how you‚Äôre feeling, or what you want to hear. Instantly start radio stations based on songs, artists, or albums, or browse by genre, mood, activity, decade, and more. Bring your own music collection with you by uploading 50,000 of your own songs; then listen to them across Android, iOS, and the web, for free.

Subscribe to get on-demand access to millions of songs and download anything to listen even when you‚Äôre not connected - or sign up for the family plan on Android to provide access for up to six family members for one low price. Plus, subscriptions come with YouTube Music Premium membership, so you can enjoy YouTube Music ad-free, in the background, and offline.

Free features:
*Radio curated by experts for anything you want to hear
*Store up to 50,000 songs from your personal music collection
*Discover and subscribe to podcasts
*Smart recommendations based on your taste
*Listen on Android, iOS, and the web

Subscription-only features:
*The family plan, where up to six family members can enjoy Google Play Music for one low price.
*On-demand access to over 35 million songs
*YouTube Music Premium membership (see music.youtube.com/music_premium for details)
*Download music to your device and listen when you‚Äôre not connected
*Ad-free, uninterrupted listening

Learn where Google Play Music is available at https://support.google.com/googleplay/?p=availability

Learn more about Google Play Music at https://play.google.com/music

comments: Too many playback errors. Sometimes the song will skip randomly in the middle, and others it will take forever to start. I have tried restarting the app several times, and even deleting and redownloading. However, after redownloading I had lost several items I recently added to my library. If these issues were a rarity, then it would be less of an issue. I hope there's a bug fix or something soon.

I have been an android user since its debut. And I dont use any other player. Lately I have been having a few issues. My album art doesn't show up. While playing music in my vehicle via bluetooth, I can only see the initial song that's played. Once the song changes, it does not change on vehicle display. The app crashes but not often. Also, when streaming a playlist based on artist/song, I hear 5-7 songs, it begins repeating. OH YEAH, a customizable theme would be nice. Orange isnt for everyone.

I've used this app for years now and never saw a reason to bother with another one. But now I need to switch to another option. I use music on my phone to deal with sensory issues. Unfortunately, Google has decided to start sneaking Tracks It Thinks I Might Like (I think) on my playlists every here and there. At first, I could delete them and found an option to tell it to stop downloading them. But now, it streams them instead, and I can't just get rid of them with the 'delete' button anymore. This is extremely disrupting and, in areas of higher stress/sensory input, downright distressing. I need to switch to another music player because and only because I can't find an "off setting" for its new "add random music you don't own to your Playing Now" habit. If they decide to fix this and I find out that they fixed it, I really wouldn't mind going back to it. But for now, it's a no-go for me.

Ok so I really enjoy this app, but there is some room for improvment with the screening. Some things to change 1. Dont make it so easy to accidentally delete a song from your very time spent on play list by swiping left or right. Only leave the three button section with the delete option. 2. I really enjoy the download option, but dont make it so easy to undownload your playlist. 3. Put the shazam option back on to make it easier to find song. 4. Let us see the lyrics

I can't even put my playlists in alphabetical order, which usually when I add music to a playlist it does it automatically anyway. And when I try to put all of a certain artist's music in a playlist, not even all of the songs will move over into that playlist. A lot of my album covers are also not showing up either. The app in general is also very buggy and definitely not what it used to be.

title: Seesaw Parent & Family
description:
Seesaw is a digital portfolio that gives you real-time glimpses into your child‚Äôs school day. Seesaw helps you stay in the loop and gives you an opportunity to support your child's learning at home. 

Used in over 200,000 classrooms, 1 in 4 schools in the US, and over 100 countries! 

**Named Best Website of 2016 by American Association of School Librarians, 2016 Top Pick for Education by Common Sense Media, and featured in by Apple as "Perfect for Every Classroom" for 9 months.**

+REQUIRES A SEESAW SIGNUP CODE FROM YOUR CHILD'S TEACHER TO USE+

When your child adds a new post to their journal, like a photo, video or drawing, you'll automatically get notified. Follow the notification to view the new addition to your child‚Äôs journal and support their learning. 

FEATURES 
Simple Sign Up
‚àô  Scan the QR code on the handout you received from your child's teacher to create an account

Automatic Notifications About New Posts
‚àô  Check out what your child is doing at school, wherever you are! 
‚àô  Customize your notification preferences. Receive all notifications or a daily digest 
‚àô  Leave a text or voice comment to encourage your child! 

Easily Message Teachers 
‚àô Message privately with your child‚Äôs teacher
‚àô Receive class-wide announcements 

All of Your Student‚Äôs Work in One Place!
‚àô  Browse your child‚Äôs journal from each class 
‚àô  View posts on a calendar or sort by folders 
‚àô Translate notes, comments and captions into 50+ languages, including Spanish, French, Chinese, Japanese and more! 
‚àô  Save anything to your device's camera roll 

All Content is Private and Secure 
‚àô  Student content is secure, and is never shared with 3rd parties. 
‚àô  Check out our Privacy Principles at http://web.seesaw.me/privacy 

Export a Zip Archive of Your Child's Work
‚àô  Available anytime on the web anytime at: app.seesaw.me.

Need help? Visit our Help Center at help.seesaw.me.

comments: The app is great and the intentions of the app works wonders. However, only being able to get access and use through cell phone is not so great. My phone is too difficult for my daughter to do her work on and would be best if it was accessible for pc use, especially during the school shut downs and digital learning days where getting there work done at home is a requirement and the only school connected outlet for their education.

This app is great for online learning! My only problem is I used to get notifications on the app itself when the teachers posted something or messaged us. Now the only way I know if something was added is through an email.

Have used successfully last year and this year until installed on my new Galaxy S20+. Now I no longer receive push notifications on the phone, and yes I have the option to allow push notifications turned on. Have uninstalled and reinstalled with no luck.

I don't like that it's 2 apps and you can't have access to the classes through the Parent$Family app!! They should make it one! I'm tired of downloading apps. I'm tired of any kind of screen time for kids any age really. I have no idea what the Seesaw for Classes is,but it better not have anything to do with watching videos.

having so much touble with this app been trying for over an hour to log on i tried all the options to log on and it keeps telling me i have to scan my code but the app wont open the cam on my laptop that i have no choice but to use because my sons tablet wont even let him dowload the app

title: Skype - free IM & video calls
description:
Skype keeps the world talking. Say ‚Äúhello‚Äù with an instant message, voice or video call ‚Äì all for free*.

Use Skype to send SMS messages to mobiles worldwide and with SMS Connect you can now also read and reply to your phone's SMS messages right from your computer. SMS connect will be released gradually.

‚Ä¢ Video calls ‚Äì Don‚Äôt just hear the cheers, see them! Get together with 1 or 24 of your friends and family on a HD video call. Watch everyone‚Äôs smiles and cries when you tell them ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre engaged!!!" 
‚Ä¢ Chat ‚Äì Reach people instantly. Send messages to your friends, grab someone‚Äôs attention with @ mentions, or create a group chat to plan a family reunion. 
‚Ä¢ SMS Connect - Read and reply to your phone's SMS messages in Skype on your PC or Mac.
‚Ä¢ Share ‚Äì Send photos and videos with your family and friends. Save shared photos and videos to your camera roll. Share your screen to make travel plans with friends or present designs to your team.
‚Ä¢ Voice calls ‚Äì Camera shy? Make voice calls to anyone in the world on Skype. You can also call mobile and landlines at low rates.
‚Ä¢ Express yourself ‚Äì Liven up conversations with emoticons, click on the ‚Äú+‚Äù in chat to send a Giphy or images from the web, and annotate images with words, lines and more.

By downloading the Skype Preview, you‚Äôll gain early access to our newest and coolest features. Of course, while you‚Äôre having fun, know that this app is a work in progress. We're hoping to get your vital feedback as we add new enhancements and features to Skype. Simply click the heart icon on the main screen and you will be able to send your comments to our team, helping us shape the future of Skype.

Skype is available on phones, tablets, PCs and Macs.

*Skype to Skype calls are free. Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or WiFi connection.

comments: I accidentally created an account with my phone number, thinking I was adding it to my already-existing account. Unfortunately, that now means (according to Microsoft customer service) that my phone number can never be associated with my account, even if the accidentally-created account is deleted. One little mistake on my end that any other business would be able to fix now means that this app is less than useless for me. :/

This is a very bad application, I installed this application 5 month ago, they asked for a credit card information. I used if a few days and the App says the first month is free. After that few days I didn't use it anymore but they have charged me for 4 month. They didn't send any in-app notifications for charging or emails, despite the fact that they have already the email. On the other side , the settings is a complicated one and you can't find where to go for cancellation.

This is a great app, since I started using Android phone, I have used Skype since then and the best thing about it is video and audio are very clean, which gives good quality, I like it. By using its app and I will always be in touch with it and I hope that things will come up on the sky better and the process will work and on the sky is the very good app,

Terrible - This app does not work on my android tv box. Skype has downloaded but will not allow me to reach the sign in page. A pop up error message suggests checking my internet connection but there is nothing wrong with my WIFI or Ethernet connections. I guess I'm going to be even more socially distant from my family than planned.

They eat up the money you load after a while. They send you email saying if you do not log in, you will loose your credit. If you miss to log in, it totally disappear. There is no way of talking to someone or getting an email address to send message. You are going looptiloop for hours on their site and find no way to contact them.

title: Google Play Movies & TV
description:
Google Play makes finding and watching movies & TV shows easier than ever.

Buy or rent the newest movies and shows before they hit DVD or streaming. You can also search for titles to see which streaming apps offer them.

comments: Will agree with people saying this app use to be great. I loved watching movies from Google play. But recently I rented The Joker but it was wasted money instead because I kept getting a message that said it can not playback and something about needing chromecast. It's a bummer because I was really looking forward to watching that movie. Now I cant watch any one the movies I've purchased in the past. I'm so sad üò≠üò≠üò≠

Used to be ok but now useless. I keep getting an error when trying to play anything in my library. The error says 'this type of playback isn't supported and I need to use Chromecast instead of mirroring' But I'm not trying to mirror my screen, just watch on my phone. Tried reinstalling the app but no difference. Used to work fine til yesterday so now my movie collection which I have paid alot of money to Google for is not accessible! Needs to be fixed urgently.

1st, it's absolutely ridiculous that with an Android TV Box you CAN NOT download a content unless you use WiFi! I have a much faster Ethernet connection but it says I have to use WiFi! That is completely stupid! Second, you download the videos and good luck finding them. Of course even though I bought them there is no standard video file in the locations it says movie / tv files or stored, whether I tell it internal or SD Card. I'm disappointed I didn't know these things before I bought content. Just having to switch my box back forth from Gigabit Ethernet to WiFi is bad enough then to not be able to move them to my 2TB hard drive simply adds insult to injury!

I love using this app for most of my digital media purchases. One problem, though and I'm not sure if it's being looked into or how deep it goes. I think whoever is in charge of creating thumbnails is completely unprofessional. My example is The Magicians in the newer seasons, whoever created the thumbnails is intentionally picking characters making a "goofy" face. Season four is a very emotional and powerful season, but the thumbnails created for it make it out to be a complete joke!

Its a really great app. But when ever I'm trying to play some of the TV series. I purchased some episodes won't play. It keeps on saying error and try to restart my device if problem persists. I tried that. And it isn't working. And I still can't watch my purchased movies. When they are downloaded. Only on wifi. Please fix this

Whether you want to keep up with the latest from the local community or interested in the top breaking news local weather alerts, from around the world or the latest national and international political stories, sports and more - you can find and share all your favorite local and global news and weather alerts on all social network with US Breaking news App !.

comments: This app is annoying enough with its CONSTANT notifications all day and night, but the articles aren't even breaking news. Example: I got 4 notifications in the last half hour for an article titled '3-year-old child killed in Florida, runed over by a truck'. It was a couple paragraphs about an unfortunate incident that happened A MONTH AGO. And yes, that was the exact grammar and spelling used in the headline. Do not waste your time with this app.

Extremely up-to-date with the latest stories! Lot's of local information I'm interested in. Very happy with this news service!üëçüòÄ Update: 3-19-2020 This app has become nothing but continuous ad after ad after ad! News stories written in a few sentences with stupid, useless ads in between! Sorry, I uninstalled!üòØü§®‚òπüëé
I uninstalled. Too many ads that make the page jump up & down. It's hard to read an article with ads popping up in the middle & having to scroll down through them.
There are all kinds of news on this App but I gave 2 stars because the App crashes every 20 min or so. "Breaking News has stopped" "Send report". Those are the annoying messages it pops up.
Easy to scroll through each story without wasting time getting to the next article. Each story has enough information without being too long in length

With HBO NOW you can watch big premieres as they air‚Äîplus every episode of HBO‚Äôs addictive series such as Game of Thrones, Westworld, Watchmen, and so much more.

comments: No videos i select apparently have sound files with them. My internet connection is famtastic and all my other apps and devices are woking fine. Even your in videos advertisements are working phenomonally, but when it gets to the part i paid for the soundbyte goes out and its starting to make me angry. Im considering cancelling my subscription.

The HBO app constantly kicks me out of the video saying they can't play the video, forces me to go back to then relaunch the video. I watched a movie where I had to do this about 50 times no joke, this is the most annoying Thing of this app. It would be one thing if it didn't happen on every show but it happens every single program I've ever watched and HBO since the moment I installed this app. I hope HBO has a fix for this because I can't believe I'm the only one that this is happening to

Worst streaming service. Every interaction is frustrating. Too bad your burying good content with terrible ux. Rewind is frustrating. Navigating is frustrating. Getting kicked out is frustrating. Video quality is really bad. Loads forever. None of my other streaming apps do this I have solid fiber connection.

I'm paying $25 a month so that ten minutes into a movie the app can stop working. Permanently. Turn the console off, uninstall the app, switch to a computer, it doesn't matter, the playback ends and won't go past the marker it first buffered at. And yes, it's across all my devices. I can watch Netflix, Hulu and Prime all in 4K but HBO, the most expensive one, crashes constantly. According to the help line, my internet download/upload and latency is more than DOUBLE what HBO requires to playback HD video. Their solution? To email me later when the "app developers" think of something. So answer me something. Why am I paying a monthly rate that is bonkers expensive compared to other streaming services for an app that quite actually has more buffering than a movie streaming site that will show me this title for FREE? The only thing this app has going for it is the original content which, while great, you can find anywhere else online with less buffering. And that doesn't cost you $25 a month.

Frustrating interface that is not intuitive. No movie information page is available, it just immediately plays the movie with any touch, useless. Category organization is not employed unless an alphabetical only listing of every movie is the only category. Chromecast functionality appears to work.

title: Cloud Print
description:
Download the latest release of the official Google Cloud Print app. With Cloud Print for Android you can:

- Print from any compatible Android device to any Google Cloud Print connected printer
- Share a picture or a document from apps like Gallery directly to Cloud Print
- Track the status of your print jobs
- Process printer invitations. Open invitation links from email in Cloud Print
- Find and register new Cloud Ready printers on the local network*

 Printing from Android has never been easier.

 The Google Cloud Print app is a print plugin on Android KitKat, and a standalone app on earlier versions of Android. If you update your device to KitKat, you may need to remove the icon manually.
*Not all models support local discovery - check the setup manual of your printer for details

comments: Erratic printing on my Brother MFC-J995DW -- which IS a Cloud Print compatible printer. And yes I have installed according to instructions -- about 10 times !! And yes, the printer shows up in my list of printers in my Google Settings. And yes, I can print a page -- after about 20 requests. This is really mediocre work, Google !! I am shopping for a replacement printer, but Google's list of Chrome capatible printers is out of date. Sloppy job, Google !!! Cloud Print Sucks !!!

The Cloud Print is a good idea to typing in a computer that sent you working for now anyway can be used to download any other images pop up in this app or Google Drive to work on a regular schedule to earned it about the same option in my Android phone within the help of a Google account.

Would not open on Samsung S10 wouldn't allow me connect kodak Printer and cannot can be found in my apps after downloading. Uninstalled with immediate effect. Since last Google update UI not responding, apps not responding properly and so on. Is this another ploy to get me to buy another device or software? Don't think so. Rather go manual. Still not responding and now other apps keep crashing whilst some insist you have to pay for premium services to print wirelessly. Not a wise idea.

Worked fine for the last year or so. Now whenever I try to print anything (I only use the save to Google drive option) it just crashes immediately. Briefly flashes a notification that its crashed then repeats every second until I cancel the order to print. I've had to uninstall it and use the save to pdf built in then manually upload to Google drive.

title: Guitar Lessons, Bass & Ukulele | Fender Play
description:
LEARN & SAVE
Get 10% off gear all year with an Annual Plan or 10% off your next order with Monthly and start learning guitar, bass or ukulele today.

Fender Play¬Æ is the complete learning app for guitar, bass and ukulele. Play your first song in minutes with easy, fun, bite-sized lessons, featuring your favorite songs.
Start Your 14 day Free Trial Today!

Learn with Easy Lessons for Beginners
o Play songs and riffs in minutes
o Structured learning paths guide beginner players through the step-by-step basics - from chords to strumming to scales

Play on-the-go with Lessons for Guitar, Bass and Ukulele
o Try out new sounds and genres with lessons for both acoustic and electric instruments 
o Strumming techniques and skills are broken down into short, manageable lessons by difficulty level
o Learn a skill, then play a song using those techniques

Perfect for Beginners
o Lessons focus on the essentials like how to read tabs and play riffs in different genres
o Simplified songs for beginning players
o New content added weekly to our video library - songs, chords, techniques, theory and exercises

Practice Your Favorite Songs 
o 100s of popular song lessons in a variety of genres, including rock, pop, country folk and blues
o Play songs from your favorite artists, including:
- Pumped up Kicks by Foster the People
- All of Me by John Legend
- Renegades by X Ambassadors
- Ain‚Äôt No Sunshine by Bill Withers

High-Quality Video Lessons
o Videos feature multiple angles and close-up shots to show finger placement
o Contextual chord diagrams, tablature and extensive glossary library are included in videos for quick reference

Track Your Journey
o You choose your instrument and favorite genre
o We provide a clear, structured path and show how far you've come
o Learn at your own pace and practice whenever you want

Learn to Play from the Best Instructors
o Engaging instructors with tips and tricks for simple, step-by-step learning
o Practice bass with backing tracks to develop your technique
o Get Fender Play now and start playing!

Try out Fender Play FREE for 14 days with a Monthly or Annual plan. Annual plan also includes 10% off Fender products in the U.S. and U.K. Learn more at: http://fendr.co/3EN7ih

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account once your free 14-day trial is complete. Your subscription renews automatically within 24 hours of the end of each period and you can cancel at any time. Your subscription includes access to Fender Play apps for iPhone, iPad and on the web. 1575 N Gower St
Los Angeles, CA 90028
recentChanges:
Take a look at the NEW design!

We‚Äôve made your learning to play a little easier.

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:
- My Path: Clean, clear design makes it easier to jump back in
- Updated Course Layout: See what you‚Äôll learn at a glance
- Change Your Path: It‚Äôs easy to jump around from rock to pop, guitar to uke ‚Äî and we‚Äôll save your place
comments: Lessons are good for beginner guitarists so I don't want people to think this is a bad way to learn guitar or bass. If the app doesnt crash as often, it would get 4 stars. The app is almost unusable as it fequently crashes. I've been able to recreate this consistently while exiting full screen on videos or when going from lesson to exercise in landscape mode. If this gets fixed, then I'd say the lesson+user experience is pretty good, as the app layout is decent and the content is good.

Tried to create an account on the website, nothing happened and I was stuck on the create an account screen, so I downloaded the app and tried to create an account, but it said I already had an account so I went to go sign in and apparently the login info was incorrect. I then went to reset my password to see if that would help, but nope. It gave me the reset code but nowhere to put it. Fender, you make good guitars and basses, but the shitties apps and websites.

Great content and instructors. Possible to view tablature, chords etc along with the video. Nice mix of lessons and songs. There can be some slight video playback issues at times but they are getting better. Have contacted support who are fast to respond and friendly, they helped me work through a couple of app related issues and ensure that the video stuff is being ironed out (only reason for 4 stars). All in all a great app that helps you learn at your own pace. Recommended!

No way to restart the practice mode without backing out of it and then clicking it again. The "tabs" don't have the sheet music along with it or any other way to know the timing of the music. It seems to freeze up a lot. Has no way to contact anyone about problems with the app.

A great way to start learning how to play guitar, bass or ukulele!! Perhaps the best part is the Facebook Fender Play Support community! Everyone is very supportive of each other and offer tips to help overcome some of the harder parts of learning. Plus it's great to others are out there doing the same thing!

title: AliExpress - Smarter Shopping, Better Living
description:
Ever wanted to shop everything in one place, at one time? We‚Äôve created just the app for you! With thousands of brands and millions of items at an incredible value, AliExpress is the go-to app for those in the know. 

Shop what‚Äôs new and now from home to health, tech to toys and sports to shoes (plus the hottest fashion around) every day. And, let‚Äôs not forget all our deals! From flash and super deals to coupons and more, you can get the best items at the best prices in a swipe.

There are countless reasons to love shopping on the AliExpress app but here are some of our favorites:

‚Ä¢ Millions of trendy and unique items
‚Ä¢ Easy search, so you can find what you want quickly
‚Ä¢ Image search, so you can find unique items easily and quickly 
‚Ä¢ Coupons, discounts, flash and super deals, so you‚Äôll always get the best price
‚Ä¢ Free shipping on over 75% of our items
‚Ä¢ Order management and automatic shipping notifications
‚Ä¢ Buyer Protection on all your purchases
‚Ä¢ Secure online payment
‚Ä¢ Personalized feeds, with items picked especially for you

Language Support
We‚Äôre global, so our app is too! We support English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Bahasa Indonesian, Thai, Italian, German, French, Hebrew, Korean, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Vietnamese, Japanese and Ukrainian.

Currency Support
Our app currently supports 8 different currencies for payment (Euros, US Dollars, Canadian Dollars, Australian Dollars, Japanese Yen, British Sterling, Russian Rubles and Swedish Krona), plus another 6 currencies for browsing (Brazilian Real, Indian Rupee, Ukrainian Hryvnia, Indonesia Rupiah, Mexican Peso and Turkish Lira).

Tell Us What You Think
Like us? Love us? Can't get enough of the AliExpress app? Let us know! We'd love to hear your thoughts. Plus, if you see any areas for improvement while using our app, tell us that, too! We take all feedback seriously and use it for constant improvement. Drop us a line in the app by tapping "More" then "App Suggestion".

comments: Worst app ever you will be lucky to receive anything you purchase. When installed it permits itself to control and make changes to every single function on your device it can even control your wifi, scary eh! It gets worse, when you figure it out and disable all these self appointed permissions the device requires a security update a day or so later and everything goes back to the way it was. title: HP Smart
description:
Print, scan, and share by using HP Smart with your HP Printer anytime, anywhere! HP Smart makes setup, printing, and scanning easier than ever!
 
¬∑ Set up and manage your HP printer directly from the app
¬∑ View printer status and send prints on the go
¬∑ Print, copy, scan, and share files directly from your mobile device to your friends, co-workers, or the cloud
¬∑ Edit and enhance your photos with filters, crop, add text, and adjustments like saturation, contrast, brightness
¬∑ Use your mobile device‚Äôs camera to create high-quality scans, then preview/edit/save them as PDFs and JPEGs and store in your favorite cloud storage account
¬∑ Order supplies and get support straight from the app
 
Some HP Smart functionality requires you to have either internet or cellular service. Certain features/software are available in English language only. For a full list of supported printers, visit: http://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c03722645?openCLC=true

recentChanges: Minor enhancements and bug fixes.
comments: Scan via phone's cam is a great feature and works very well, using a smart algorithm to aligning the angle so that the page does not need to be perfectly aligned. Scan via printer is not letting you change document sizes when using document feeder, only if in glass. Also, adding and reordering documents to a scan is not possible (anymore?). Would be very useful to address these two features in nearby updates. Communication between phone and printer is otherwise without complains.

This app is not user friendly at all. Scanning is slow and trying to save a scanned document to my Google Drive is not possible on my Chrome Book. When I firs installed my HP printer, it was very difficult even hough I followed he directions precisely. Also, I am very disappointed that I have to "manually" print double-sided, and when I ask it to print 2 copies, it'll only print one copy. I don't know if the problem is with the app or the model of the HP printer I have.

I have a new HP computer and bought a NEW HP OfficeJet 5258. I installed the HP Smart and connected it to my computer. The app just sits and 'spins', doesn't save or print. I literally am so frustrated with it I may take the printer back. I would think that since both computer and printer are HP, things would work seamlessly. But this seems to not be the case.

Finally got it set up and connected. Printed the test page just fine, but when I tried to print from my Moto G 5 Plus it cancelled. All it says is "cancelling" on my phone but it isn't cancelling or printing. I can't even cancel it because it says it's cancelling. Can't delete it or do anything. I've turned the printer off and unplugged it but it still won't cancel. POS so far. I'm glad I didn't buy any spare cartridges.

I have had different HP Printers with Instant Ink and they have all worked perfectly for me. I like how I can send an email directly to my printers email to print. Even if you are not at home, you can still print anything you need. I signed up for the fax service but I have not used it yet. There are different plans for the instant ink you can change to. 500 sheets of paper for $5 thru Amazon from HP is a great deal. I have been using HP Printers for years and I will never betray HP Thanks HP!

title: Carrier Hub
description:
Carrier Hub enables Sprint features and products for devices operating on the Sprint network.  This software feature enables customers to turn on Sprint products (for example Voice Over Wifi).  Carrier Hub also assists our Network engineering for customer reported service concerns.

This latest update is needed for Google Android Q requirements.  Carrier Hub is pre-installed at the manufacturing process and updates must now occur through the Google Play Store.
