title: ANT+ Plugins Service
description:
ANT is a wireless protocol, similar to Bluetooth¬Æ, that is predominantly used for sport and fitness wireless connectivity. Pre-installed by the phone manufacturer, this service allows you to connect ANT+ devices to apps on your phone.  ANT Wireless is a division of Garmin Canada Inc.

ANT enabled apps can utilize this service to connect:
‚Ä¢ Heart Rate: Receive live heart rate data from heart rate straps or wearables produced by many popular manufacturers
‚Ä¢ Fitness Equipment: Connect ANT+ enabled fitness equipment and bicycle trainers to  popular training and workout apps
‚Ä¢ Bike Speed and Cadence: Capture bike speed, distance, and/or cadence data
‚Ä¢ Bike Power: Capture data from ANT+ cycling power meters such as Garmin Vector  
‚Ä¢ Stride-based Speed and Distance Monitor: Capture speed and distance data from running footpods

For a full list of compatible ANT+ apps and devices visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory/

FAQ:
How did this app get on my phone and is it spyware? 
This service is standard software, included by the manufacturer of your phone. It is not illegally downloaded, and it is not spyware. It will not cause system malfunctions or pop-up ads to appear. It is not bloatware and typically uses a max of 20 MB of space. For example, on a 16GB phone, this service takes up 0.0013% of space. We do not pay phone manufacturers to have this service pre-installed. 

How can I remove this service? 
Since this service is standard software, you‚Äôre unable to delete it from your phone. Instead, you can disable this service by following the manufacturer‚Äôs instructions. The typical process is: settings>applications>application manager>appropriate app>force stop>disable

Disabling this service will not affect your phone‚Äôs software. If, in the future, you require the ability to connect to services and devices via ANT+, just enable the service again. 

NOTE: Since this is a factory installed service, it may enable/re-download if you reset and/or update your phone. Don‚Äôt panic! Just follow the instructions to disable it again. 

Does this service track me without my knowledge?
No. The ANT Radio Service and ANT+ Plugins Service applications provide a wireless connectivity service, similar to Bluetooth or WiFi, but with very low power. These services do not collect any personal data.

Is it difficult to develop an app with ANT+ capabilities and is there a fee? 
Using the ANT+ plugins in your app to communicate with ANT+ devices is quick, easy, free and uses a simple API. Visit the ANT Android Developer page (http://www.thisisant.com/developer/ant/ant-in-android) for more information and to download the SDK. 

How do I know if I own any ANT enabled products? 
Visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory to search for ANT/ANT+ enabled products, devices and/or services.

title: Q13 News
description:
Livestreaming, breaking news notifications, and all the local news you want from Q13 FOX in a fast, high-performance app.

Watch and read stories at the same time -- the video plays as you scroll. Be the first to know with breaking news alerts, and find out what's happening in your area with News Near Me. 

Never miss any Q13 FOX news - you can livestream our newscasts right from your phone or tablet. Save stories to read later, and share easily to Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks. 

Get a head start on your day with Q13 FOX traffic and weather maps. Enter our latest contests and promotions right from your phone, and catch up on all your favorite segments from Q13 FOX.

Please note: This app features Nielsen‚Äôs proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsen‚Äôs TV Ratings. Please see http://priv-policy.imrworldwide.com/priv/mobile/us/en/optout.html for more information.

comments: The news app would be MUCH better if there were actual categories for articles, not just every article lumped together without direction. For example, having categories such as "local news", "national news", "international news", "sports" etc, perhaps with subcategories like "North Sound", "South Sound" to further organize articles. As it is now, its messy, chaotic, and visually confusing. That's the number one reason I avoid the Q13 app unless absolutely necessary.
Very good pages Easy-to-Read can see the photos on each page for topic, and I like the colors of the web pages

Absolutely terrible app. More often than not, it was spam the living hell out of your notifications and then when you actually click on one to see the story it goes to a blank page that says Android users click here if this doesn't work and then when you do it gives you an error page or blank page or maybe sometimes when it feels like it, the Q13 default page. You don't ever get to read or view the story. That would be too much to ask. Avoid this app like the plague it was written by amateurs obviously. Utter garbage.

title: Mods. for. Minecraft PE - mcpe
description:
What is the Mod Maker for Minecraft PE application, how does it work?
Mod Maker for Minecraft PE is a Productivity app on the Android platform.

No need to learn programming language to be a MCPE modder. Let's show off your creativity by creating your own Minecraft mods using this mod maker app, without typing a line of code.

‚òÖ KEY FEATURES ‚òÖ
Survival and adventure
Mods to make the game even more interesting in survival and adventure, for example, travel to another horse, along with the mcpe horse mod.
- Strong lightning
- More aggressive mobs
- Powerful zombies
- Large spiders
- FNAF mod
To survive in such conditions, you need to have a lot of experience in playing the minecraft. Also you can survive in harsh conditions with friends through multiplayer.

Furniture Mod
Arrange your nest with cheats and addons mcpe.
- Stylish armchair
- Comfortable sofa
- Functional bath
- Wooden table and chair
- Own TV
Living in a cozy and beautiful house is much more interesting. Mod furniture is a great simulator of life in MInecraft.

Animals and pets
You diversify your game world, you can easily change the standard mobs to new ones.
- Pixelmond mod
- Lama mod
- Pet mod
- The Dog
- Cat
- Dinosaur
Replace the standard pet, also look after it and it will protect you.

Cars, tanks, cars and airplanes
Install the mcpe mod and you will get powerful military equipment, fast supercars, airplanes of different types.
- Supercar
- Jeep
- Helicopter
- Old aircraft
- Fighter
- Tank and other equipment
Have your car park along with the pocket manager mcpe.

Armor and weapons
Equip armor - it will save your life. Choose the right sword or machine.
- Weapon mod
- Legendary Swords
- Armor and modern armor
- Explosive ammunition
If you install tnt mod - be careful, it is very powerful. All the blocks will be scattered from it.

Tools
With the help of different tools you can control the weather to change the texture of the world, create your own mobs and pets.
- Toolbox
- Blocklauncher
- Worldedit
- Pocket Manager
In the application, there are different modes and addons, some can request a block launcher tool.

Portals
Portals consist of different resources and are difficult to obtain in the game world.
- Edge of the World
- Lower world
Using mcpe mods, you can quickly and easily make a portal in the game.

GTA
Mod GTA 5 will help you create your own gang and make a real shooter simulator just like in the game.
- Gangs
- Weapons
- Wheelbarrows
Also, for a full presence, you can use thematic GTA skins and maps.

With this app there is no limit for your creativity. From now Lucky Block, Elemental Swords, Super Heroes, Come Alive, Animals Mods..all awesome titles can be created by YOUR OWN. Ready to be a MODDER !!!!

ATTENTION:

This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved.

title: Instacart Shopper: Earn Money
description:
MAKE EXTRA CASH FOR HOLIDAY SEASON
Need extra cash for holiday shopping? Sign up, make money, and earn a little extra for the holidays.

BE A HOUSEHOLD HERO
From families to seniors, make someone's day, every day by delivering groceries and everyday essentials when they need them the most.

FLEXIBILITY TO MEET YOUR NEEDS
Earn with Instacart while balancing work and life. Shop and/or deliver on your own schedule. 

CHOOSE YOUR PERSONAL PATH
Be your own boss or develop a career path as an employee ‚Äî it‚Äôs up to you. Get started as a full-service shopper and shop and deliver fresh groceries to customers‚Äô doors, or sign up as an in-store shopper and shop for groceries in-store, working with a great team and growing your career with Instacart.

GET PAID FAST
Get paid weekly. Full service shoppers cash out every day with Instant Cashout.

comments: Shopper here. This has been an enjoyable experience so far. My only nit-picky issue with this app is that it has no contogencie plan for when things don't go perfectly smooth (which 99% of the time nothing goes wrong). Only once was an Advantage card for a customer not accepted and had to be rescanned. I couldn't get the card to be presented again. Everything else has been A+

I'm a new shopper, done a few shopping runs, however each run has major app connectivity problems!! Extremely frustrating when I'm at the store & I can't access the shopping list & none of the suggested solutions work. I even called support but was disconnected after 10 minutes on hold (30 minutes after arriving at the store). I have high speed internet on my phone & great cell reception. Please fix the problems!!!!! Also ought to pay shoppers for the time wasted when app is glitching!

I was happy about the promise of orders automatically being removed from my dashboard. That is until I got stuck in a horrible nightmare of having an error I guess where that didn't happen. The app said to call my customer and to contact instacart care. I am currently on attempt number 4 to contact instacart. It has been over 3 hours so far. The chat system is completely useless. I have had 2 separate calls today disconnect before I got help.

For the most part I like the app but I was having issues at checkout when the cards kept getting declines. I restart the app and I had already checked for updates and there was none. Very irritating doing double batches and can't checkout. Customers even added new cards still declined. Please look into features.

I love the shopper app! Works so smoothly the only problem at aldi half the items do not scan and you have to force scan even thou its the correct item but I never have problems at cvs. Also the layout of the app on how to shop is wrong for aldi its not faster going by how they recommend you shoo because each store is layed out differently but other then that it works great abd with my gps. It does not drain my battery at all my mother has that problem thou but I dont overall very pleased

title: Kids A-Z
description:
Have fun learning with Raz-Kids, Science A-Z, and Headsprout on the Kids A-Z app!
  
With Kids A-Z, students can complete various interactive activities from the Raz-Kids, Science A-Z, and Headsprout products and update their robot avatars on mobile devices.
  
Students using the app can:
‚Ä¢ Access hundreds of developmentally-appropriate books, exercises, and other resources
‚Ä¢ Complete corresponding quizzes that ensure comprehension
‚Ä¢ Utilize interactive annotation tools that support close reading skills
‚Ä¢ Have their work scored and reported to their teacher automatically
‚Ä¢ Customize their personalized robot avatar and space rocket using the stars earned from completing activities
  
The Kids A-Z app is free to download, but access to Raz-Kids, Science A-Z, and Headsprout content requires subscriptions to the respective product.  For more info about our products and subscriptions, please visit our website:
  
https://www.learninga-z.com/site/products/

comments: The app works great for us. We use it through my son's school. I like how it quizzes the students after each book and some give the option to listen to it vs. just reading it. Also, it changes the level once you have completed all the books in the previous level.

Although this seems like it has the potential to be a great app, we were only able to get through one book before the app started glitching. This is a school requirement and it would be greatly appreciated if this was fixed quickly. I see from other reviews that I am not the only one having this problem.

First the mobile app is not in sync with the main site, it will says 48 activities to next level while the main site says 44 and the main site is right. Some books listening sessions never load and the kids keep struggling or just scroll to the end.
It offers an incredibly large amount of reading materials, which is really helpful for either teachers or English learners at all levels.
app stopped working correctly, it is now zooming through books without audio. emailed dev

title: QR code reader & Barcode Scanner (QR Code Scanner)
description:
Fastest QR Code Reader & Barcode Scanner For Android

QR Code Reader and barcode scanner is the fastest and the most powerful QR code Scanner/Barcode Reader in the market. It supports all major QR code Scan and Barcode Scan. 

QR Code Scanner can scan and read all QR code/ barcode types including text, url, ISBN, product, contact, calendar, email, location, Wi-Fi, Facebook, Twitter, Email and many other formats. After scan and automatic decoding user is provided with only the relevant options for individual QR or Barcode type and can take action. You can even use QR Code Scanner to scan coupon codes to receive discounts and save some money. All this, 100% FREE!

When scanning a QR code, if the code contains a website URL, you will automatically be taken to that website. If the code contains text, you'll immediately see it. For other formats like email ID, phone numbers, or contact information, you will be prompted to take appropriate action. Amazing, no?


How to use QR code scanner and Barcode Scanner:

‚úì To scan QR code or barcode, you can simply open the app, point the camera at the code and the scanner will automatically recognize it
‚úìIf you are in the low-light situation when scanning the code, click the flashlight button to turn on the flashlight.
‚úìVarious options to choose and generate QR code and Barcode for like SMS etc. 

Features

‚òÖFastest QR code reader‚òÖ
QR code reader and Barcode scanner are the fastest in the market. You just need to point out to a QR code or a barcode to scan the code. Just once scan to find for both QR code reader and barcode scanner

‚òÖCreate Social Media Codes‚òÖ
Using this app you can create QR codes for multiple social media profiles like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube, Playstore apps, Whatsapp and many more

‚òÖSmart History for QR code reader and barcode scanner‚òÖ
Easily access all your QR code reader and barcode scanner through the history. We store all of your QR code and barcode scans in your history tab so you can view them later. 

‚òÖFlash Light‚òÖ
Easily use QR scanner and QR reader at night times or at low light conditions using the inbuilt flashlight feature. 

‚òÖMulti format‚òÖ
Use the most powerful QR scanner and QR reader to scan 1D/2D QR codes and barcodes easily. 

‚òÖScan product codes‚òÖ
If you are looking for a powerful QR code reader and barcode scanner that supports all major barcode formats such as ISBN, EAN, UPC and others, this QR Code Reader and barcode scanner is the one.

‚òÖNo internet connection required‚òÖ
This QR code reader and barcode scanner don‚Äôt require any internet connection. You can easily scan QR codes and barcode scans without any mobile internet of wifi.

‚òÖFree QR code scanner‚òÖ
All the above mentioned features of our QR code scanner/ barcode scanner app are free of cost and will always be! 

‚òÖLightening fast QR code scanner‚òÖ
Simply point your phone towards whatever you want to scan. This QR Code Reader / QR code scanner /Barcode Scanner scanner app will mechanically sense and scan. No need press any buttons, take photos or adjust zoom. QR barcode scanner /barcode scanner and generator read all QR code reader types including text, product, contact, email, whatscan, Wi-Fi and many other formats.

QR code scanner or barcode scanner build for Android, and can scan all types of QR code & barcode. It is very simple and easy to use. Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay, Google and many more.

So go ahead and download our QR code reader/ QR code scanner/ barcode scanner app to enjoy speed, convenience and great features. Scanning a QR code made as simple as it should be! 

Made with love, 
Team QR Code Reader & Barcode Scanner.

title: ANT Radio Service
description:
ANT is a wireless protocol, similar to Bluetooth¬Æ, that is predominantly used for sport and fitness wireless connectivity. Pre-installed by the phone manufacturer, this service allows you to connect ANT+ devices to apps on your phone.  ANT Wireless is a division of Garmin Canada Inc.

ANT enabled apps can utilize this service to connect:
‚Ä¢ Heart Rate: Receive live heart rate data from heart rate straps or wearables produced by many popular manufacturers
‚Ä¢ Fitness Equipment: Connect ANT+ enabled fitness equipment and bicycle trainers to  popular training and workout apps
‚Ä¢ Bike Speed and Cadence: Capture bike speed, distance, and/or cadence data
‚Ä¢ Bike Power: Capture data from ANT+ cycling power meters such as Garmin Vector  
‚Ä¢ Stride-based Speed and Distance Monitor: Capture speed and distance data from running footpods

For a full list of compatible ANT+ apps and devices visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory/

FAQ:
How did this app get on my phone and is it spyware? 
This service is standard software, included by the manufacturer of your phone. It is not illegally downloaded, and it is not spyware. It will not cause system malfunctions or pop-up ads to appear. It is not bloatware and typically uses a max of 20 MB of space. For example, on a 16GB phone, this service takes up 0.0013% of space. We do not pay phone manufacturers to have this service pre-installed. 

How can I remove this service? 
Since this service is standard software, you‚Äôre unable to delete it from your phone. Instead, you can disable this service by following the manufacturer‚Äôs instructions. The typical process is: settings>applications>application manager>appropriate app>force stop>disable

Disabling this service will not affect your phone‚Äôs software. If, in the future, you require the ability to connect to services and devices via ANT+, just enable the service again. 

NOTE: Since this is a factory installed service, it may enable/re-download if you reset and/or update your phone. Don‚Äôt panic! Just follow the instructions to disable it again. 

Does this service track me without my knowledge?
No. The ANT Radio Service and ANT+ Plugins Service applications provide a wireless connectivity service, similar to Bluetooth or WiFi, but with very low power. These services do not collect any personal data.

Is it difficult to develop an app with ANT+ capabilities and is there a fee? 
Using the ANT+ plugins in your app to communicate with ANT+ devices is quick, easy, free and uses a simple API. Visit the ANT Android Developer page (http://www.thisisant.com/developer/ant/ant-in-android) for more information and to download the SDK. 

How do I know if I own any ANT enabled products? 
Visit https://www.thisisant.com/directory to search for ANT/ANT+ enabled products, devices and/or services.

recentChanges:
Note: This service may be pre-installed by your device manufacturer to allow the ANT wireless hardware already present in your mobile device to operate. If you do not use this feature it will remain inactive.

v.4.15:
-Support more private network keys
-Various bug fixes

[Full changelog coming on our GitHub SDK README.]
comments: A critical app for active people (runners, cyclists, triathletes, skiers). ANT Radio Service allows things like heart rate monitors, fitness equipment, garmin watches, etc, to connect to your phone & apps using the ANT+ protocol (much more effective than bluetooth and allows multiple connections). It is NOT some secret gov't conspiracy. Man some of you are real pieces of work. Unfortunately with Android Pie, built-in ANT+ seems to have been forgotten, which is a bummer.

How did this app get on my phone and is it spyware? .... Bloatware.... Check permissions.... Yes this is an app that is preinstalled because this company paid Samsung or Google. The permissions to access sensitive information is present. It's funny when the developer has to say the app isn't spyware or bloatware because most of the time that is not true. Open source the code of the app so we, as the users, can see if your claims are true.

STOP TRIPPING!! Its not a radio its FM frequency to connect Smart Watches and Fit Bit type devices so it can communicate with your phone. I bought a Fitbit at Christmas and all of a sudden I see this app on my phone. It didn't come pre-installed on my Samsung S8. It on newer versions now to help make the connection easier for Smart Watches. It helps wrist devices and the app on your phone communicate. It's NOT Spyware, Bloatware or adware.

I understand what people are explaining about the app being preinstalled, and it is supposed to be helping the phone. However, I get paranoid easily especially since I opened a photo stating that people should be aware of a particular URL link because it deals with sex trafficking and THIS APP RANDOMLY STARTED DOWNLOADING... ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è if this is really the case then I apologize for my judgement without looking at ALL the reviews and I really do hope it's just a preinstalled app. Thank you.

Let's face some facts. If this app's purpose had been to be helpful to users as opposed to privacy data gathering for others (I'm looking at you, Verizon, Samsung, and developer, et al), we'd be able to delete it if we wanted. Should it be any surprise that the developer assures us that it's entirely harmless? Sheesh!

title: BPS Focus
description: Stay connected to your child's education with the Brevard Public Schools Community app. Receive real-time notifications of grades, attendance, upcoming assignments, and test scores. Conveniently view your school's Facebook, Twitter, and RSS news feeds to stay up to date on recent events and upcoming school activities. Get easy access to important links to help manage lunch payments, extracurricular activities, bus routes, and more.
descriptionHTML: Stay connected to your child's education with the Brevard Public Schools Community app. Receive real-time notifications of grades, attendance, upcoming assignments, and test scores. Conveniently view your school's Facebook, Twitter, and RSS news feeds to stay up to date on recent events and upcoming school activities. Get easy access to important links to help manage lunch payments, extracurricular activities, bus routes, and more.
summary: Brevard Public Schools Community App - Stay connected to your child's education
comments: I'm a student using this app, and I can tell that this app had minimal effort put into its development. It only provides the overall grade for the class and letter grades on assignments. I don't like how I can't see my specific grade on an assignment.

The app provides minimal information at best. After loggining in, the student/parent will automatically see the list of classes and the overall grade. However, when he or she clicks on the blue class link, the list of assignments and the grades for each one is not viewable. Lets say, the student has a D or F, this means that student will not log into the browser version of Focus to find out why their grade is low, they will just harass their teacher. "Why you gave me an F?" This is a problem.

Terrible user interface, shows no more than your overall grade of each class and the slide feature is weird when you use it. But at least it shows you your grades without needing to get on a computer.
It opens in your browser but is somehow worse because the window doesn't move or zoom, and only shows half of what it should.
It just sends me to a page saying theres a bug wont let me log in.

title: Stumbler: Watch amazing videos
description:
Stumbler lets you discover amazing videos. Submitted by users, featured by our editors.

The Stumbler team work hard to make sure only the latest and greatest videos get submitted and featured. If something awesome has just been filmed, you can be sure to see it first on Stumbler. If we've seen it before, we don't want to know!

Still not convinced?
‚Ä¢ Blistering speed. Stumbler lets you scroll through videos at speed. Waste no time watching all the videos that are big on the internet right now.

comments: Super addicting and i find myself pretty sucked into it for hours at a time. The only reason its not getting a full five stars is because a lot of the comments are toxic and just plain rude and they take away from the overall video experience.

Was working, but now fails to open properly and is stuck on the logo splash screen. Cleared cache and nothing, still the same.

It is a very good app similar to youtube but all either fails or the best wins that you will not find on youtube i recommend this app to anyone who wants a good laugh or see awesone wins.

title: Tijuana Flats
description:
Welcome to the Tijuana Flats Rewards App! Our app lets you order delicious Tex-Mex for pickup or delivery and earn points, redeem available rewards of your choice and reach new tiers with endless opportunities.

About Tijuana Flats Rewards:

- Earn points and redeem rewards by scanning your app for in-person orders.

- Use your receipt to scan the barcode or enter the barcode number if you forget to scan your app.

- Enjoy exclusive offers and earn rewards quicker with special bonus points days.
- Find a restaurant near you, get directions and view store hours.

recentChanges: Fixes issue where the app would sometimes get stuck at start with an all-white screen.
comments: Terrible app. Cumbersome user interface. No notification system. It would be helpful to know when a teacher posts. Always have to login. At least stay logged in for a semester. Edit: I've already enabled those notifications. It never pushes an update, and the daily email digest just says to go visit edsby.

At first it was decent but for the past couple weeks I cant log on to see how my kids are doing. I tried uninstalling and then reinstalling this app and it only made it worse it just freezes up everytime. Fix it already!!!!!

I am so thankful for it, it is super useful. But there are too many issues. To many times!!!! They need to be way more active on there app, they only do anything with it whenever there are a bunch of complains. And this is to good and useful of an app for it to be like this

Worst App Ever, never works. I've re installed it. Some teachers I cant msg. It has me under my husband's name. I get locked out once a week and have to pick a new password. Now it's just a blank screen. Seriously don't waste your time!!

Love being able to check my kids grades but I have had distortion with the app after checking "my work". Yes it's SDHC but it has not been fixed and I did try uninstalling and reinstalling and it's still hard to see the work.
